The children of the Qiu family appeared more mature and smarter than their peers. But they had experienced several gun fights and kidnappings. They were still suffering from the psychological trauma.
Qiu Xingyu would still wake up from her nightmares and run to her room to hug her to sleep.
Qiu Tong hesitated for a moment before explaining in a way that they could accept, “You guys are outstanding. Mommy is proud of you.”
“But does Mommy want to be trapped at home every day and rely on you guys to earn money to support the family? I also need to prove my worth and have some social interaction, right? Mommy needs to know some new friends and colleagues, just like how you have friends.”
Qiu Xingqiao and Qiu Xingyuan looked at each other, and their furrowed brows relaxed a little.
Qiu Xingyuan still had a stern expression on his face as he snatched the phone away. He said in a stiff voice, “Any job you take will require our approval!”
Qiu Xingyu nodded hurriedly. She lifted her little finger to make Qiu Tong pinky swear. “It can’t be dangerous!”
“You have to stay at home with us during the weekends. Your working hours have to be stable, and the boss has to…”
Qiu Tong watched in amusement as the children listed the conditions. Her lips curled into a blissful smile.
Late at night, Jin Yang and Shao An rushed back after finishing their work. When he returned to his bedroom, he took out a blank check that he had casually filled out and placed it by the bed.
Qiu Tong came out of the bathroom and looked at him in surprise.
Jin Yang hugged her slender waist and sniffed the fragrance of the shower gel on her body. He said in a hoarse voice, “I heard that you need money. You can tell me directly. We’re husband and wife…”
Qiu Tong pouted and pushed him away, looking at him seriously. “My relationship with you is not one of reliance.”
“Money for household expenses, as well as the payments to Ke Le and housekeeper will come from you, but I hope to handle some private matters by myself. After all, you have no obligation or responsibility to bear it for me. I want our relationship to be more simple.”
Qiu Tong stared at him with clear eyes. These words sounded heartless and hurtful.
However, Jin Yang understood that this was Qiu Tong’s own way of protecting herself. She was used to relying on herself and not others.
Jin Yang had to give her time to chance and learn to rely more on him.
He kept the check apologetically and apologized sincerely to her.
Qiu Tong stood on tip-toe and planted a light kiss on his lips, blinking as she silently expressed her longing for him.
Jin Yang bent down to pick her up. He pushed aside a glass bottle on the bar and slowly lowered Qiu Tong onto it.
Just as the two of them were about to continue, the phone by the bed started vibrating.
Qiu Tong wiped the traces of her lipstick off Jin Yang’s lips and answered the call.
“Hello? Are you Madam Qiu?”
“I’m the General Manager’s assistant from the Liqing Corporation. The company is hiring a personal bodyguard for the General Manager. Are you interested in an interview?”
Terrence’s deep voice came from the other end. Qiu Tong’s eyes widened in surprise. She took out Jin Yang’s phone from his pocket and quickly searched for information about Liqing Corporation. She realized that the Liqing Corporation was a legitimate company.
She readily agreed. “Alright, I’ll be there on time tomorrow.”
The steamy atmosphere in the bedroom had mostly dissipated. Jin Yang held Qiu Tong in his arms as the two of them examined the information about the Liqing Corporation.
Qiu Tong turned her head slightly and rubbed her head against Jin Yang’s chin. Jin Yang hugged her tightly, feeling a little ticklish.
She held Jin Yang’s finger and pointed at the screen. “Do you know them?”
Jin Yang let her fiddle with his fingertips as his Adam’s apple bobbed twice. He replied, “More than half of the overseas corporations who want to have a firm foothold in this country are in collusion with a terrorist organization, or dealing in illegal weapons or pharmaceuticals. The Liqing Corporation has only started expanding in recent years. We can’t be sure of their motives for wanting to develop a branch in S City.”
“Are you sure you want to apply to be a bodyguard there?”
Jin Yang twirled Qiu Tong’s curly hair worriedly.
Qiu Tong’s eyes sparkled as she answered with a smile, “Of course. I need money and they’re willing to pay me handsomely.”
“And I can help you gather some information.. There’s no reason to refuse.”

chapters.title: Chapter 254 - Murderous Assessment
chapters.content:
Chapter 254: Murderous Assessment
At the branch office of the Liqing Corporation in S City, a car with an extremely mysterious license plate parked on the opposite road attracted the attention of the employees.
Qiu Tong was wearing a comfortable suit with her hair tied into a high ponytail. She carried her sports-style backpack and kept scrolling through the messages she had received on her phone as she waited for Terrence in the hall.
The elevator slowly descended. Terrence walked quickly to her while tidying his suit. He said in a friendly manner, “Hello, Madam Qiu Tong. I’ll bring you to the 20th floor for the interview…”
“You’re applying for the position of a bodyguard, so there might be a test of your professionalism. Is that okay?”
Qiu Tong nodded quickly and sized up Terrence from the corner of her eye. Although he looked like a common assistant, she had a nagging feeling that something was strange. For example, Terrence’s gaze made her feel uncomfortable. Was it just her imagination?
When the elevator reached the 20th floor, her eyes focused on other distracting thoughts as she followed Terrence to a spacious room.
There was no one else in the office. It was strangely quiet.
Qiu Tong saw a boxing ring in the middle of the room and looked at Terrence in confusion. The latter quickly explained, “The Liqing Corporation is very powerful and influential. It’s inevitable that they will think of ways to attack the General Manager and launch a sneak attack on the family. A personal bodyguard needs to have some ability.”
“I don’t think you will mind if we conduct some tests and evaluations on you?”
Terrence asked politely as he picked up the protective equipment on the ground. “Sure.”
Clap! Clap!—Terrance clapped his hands with a smile as three burly men with bare upper bodies walked out of the door.
Their weight was more than twice or even three times that of Qiu Tong. Their bodies were filled with tight muscles, and the killing intent in their eyes and their professional attacking postures made Qiu Tong instantly nervous.
She chose a corner of the arena and stood there with her back to the corner.
Terrence pushed his glasses up the bridge of his nose and said lightly, “Please spar with each other. Don’t hurt each other.”
Qiu Tong narrowed her eyes and raised her fist to block her face. As if they had discussed it beforehand, the burly men attacked her from three different directions. A heavy fist was aimed at her abdomen. She nimbly bent down and tried to dodge, but she still suffered a hit to her cheek.
The metallic taste of blood filled her mouth as she spat it out, adjusting her breathing.
The combatant’s attacks were powerful, but his agility was inferior to Qiu Tong. She quickly realized that she absolutely couldn’t be besieged by all three at once. She picked the seemingly weakest opponent and raised her right leg to kick his knee. After striking the same spot consecutively, the opponent’s body quickly swayed unsteadily.
Qiu Tong then found the right opportunity to circle around him. She stepped on the rope of the boxing ring and jumped up, kicking fiercely at the chest of another burly man.
The opponent immediately fell outside the ring. Qiu Tong had expended a lot of stamina, and she used her arm to wipe the sweat from her forehead.
Terrence narrowed his eyes and looked up at the surveillance camera in the corner of the room. Via his Bluetooth earpiece, he soon received the order. He nodded at the two remaining burly men on the field. They instantly took out two batons from behind their waists…
Qiu Tong’s eyes widened abruptly. She turned to look at Terrence and questioned, “Is this also part of the assessment?”
Terrence shrugged and nodded. “Of course. When we encounter an attack, none of us can determine if the other party is carrying a weapon. How you will deal with it as part of our assessment. Please do your best. They won’t hurt you.”
Bullshit! Qiu Tong nearly cursed out loud.
The moment the burly men appeared, they were filled with killing intent. She gritted her teeth and retreated. From the corner of her eye, she saw a short stick on the ground and took the opportunity to pick it up and attack. She knew that if she continued to fight with them, she would definitely not have the slightest advantage.
She deliberately exposed an opening to attract the burly man over. Their batons aimed for Qiu Tong’s weak spots, her waist and knees.
Crack! Qiu Tong could hear the bones in her body cracking. Her eyes turned red as she gritted her teeth and secretly covered her palm on her elbow. She used her special ability to heal her injuries before abruptly breaking the wooden stick, revealing sharp wooden stumps.
Qiu Tong’s stick pierced the left side of the burly man’s waist, causing blood to drip onto the ground.
Terrence hurriedly stopped her in surprise. She leaned against the railing unsteadily and took off her protective gear. Wiping the blood from the corner of her lips with the back of her hand, she asked weakly, “How is it? Did I pass the test?”
“Can you bring me to see the boss?”
Qiu Tong’s sharp gaze was focused on Terrence. Who was behind this almost brutal and murderous “assessment”?
The burly men supported each other as they left the room. Before they left, their eyes were filled with fear and admiration.
When Terrence received the instructions through his earpiece, he put on a proper smile and directed Qiu Tong to the other office.
After passing through the long corridor, she pushed open the wooden door at the end of the corridor.
Creak—the door slowly opened. The bright lights blinded her for a moment, and then she saw Yu Ge’s disgusting face!
“It’s you?!”

chapters.title: Chapter 255 - Pretending To Agree
chapters.content:
Chapter 255: Pretending To Agree
Translator: Atlas Studios Editor: Atlas Studios
Yu Ge’s lips curled into a disdainful and mocking smile. He took off his earpiece and unabashedly displayed the scene on the LCD screen to her. He replayed the scene of her being hit by the burly men repeatedly, clearly mocking her.
Qiu Tong scrutinized Terrence and Yu Ge, trying to guess their relationship.
She asked warily, “You should be in prison. Why are you here?”
“Did you kidnap the General Manager of the Liqing Corporation?”
Yu Ge laughed wildly. He pointed at the nameplate in front of the desk. “Open your eyes and look at it carefully!”
“You’re pitifully stupid! This company is mine, and so is the Liqing Corporationâ€¦”
Qiu Tong’s mind raced. The Liqing Corporation’s office was real and couldn’t be faked.
Ever since Terrence brought her to the General Manager’s office, they had not seen any security guards or employees. Was Yu Ge telling the truth? Yu Ge looked at her shocked expression and felt unprecedented satisfaction.
He slowly walked to her and poked her shoulder, a sinister and cunning smile appearing in his eyes.
“You didn’t expect this, did you? You were hired to be my personal bodyguard!”
“We used to be so good together. Maybe we can start over. I won’t despise youâ€¦”
Qiu Tong shook off Yu Ge’s hand harshly. “Stop dreaming!”
Yu Ge was not embarrassed. He pressed his thumb to his lips and took out two cheques worth $5 million.
.....
“You need money, a lot of money. That’s why you posted your personal information on the Dark Web, hoping to get a mission and a job.”
“The salary offered by the other jobs will not be as high as mine. Moreover, I can use the Liqing Corporation’s name to ban your account. No one in the Dark Web will dare to contact you again. How about that? Do you want to reconsider?”
When Yu Ge saw her furious expression, waves of satisfaction surged from the bottom of his heart.
He flung the cheques at her face and looked at her fluttering hair. Yu Ge roared, “Do you know what kind of inhumane life I led in prison? All of that was thanks to you! I was thinking about how to repay you every single moment!”
Yu Ge gritted his teeth. He saw the red marks on her face and pinched her chin in a perverted manner. “You have no choice!”
Qiu Tong stared at him in disdain. She didn’t want to have anything to do with him anymore.
Just as she was about to turn around and leave, she saw a familiar figure standing behind Terrence.
Qiu Tong stopped in surprise as she recalled where she had seen him.
730 Guangming Road! He was one of the people who attacked the professor! Could they be linked to the human modification plan?
Qiu Tong clenched her fists and quickly pretended to reconsider.
She stared fixedly at Yu Ge and said, “I can be your bodyguard, but other than protecting your personal safety, I won’t listen to any of your orders. If you are fine with that, we’ll sign the contract.”
Yu Ge stared at her in surprise and laughed out loud.
“Don’t regret this!”
He instructed Terrence to bring the contract over and watch her sign it.
Yu Ge’s lips curled into a playful smile. He wanted to torture her slowly. When she bent down to pick up the cheques, he strode forward and looked up at her. “My shoes are a little dirty. Help me wipe them?”
A cold glint flashed across her eyes as she hit Yu Ge’s knee with her hand. Yu Ge retreated in pain. Taking advantage of his retreat, she picked up the cheques. “No matter how dirty your shoes are, they can’t compare to the dirt in your heart.”
Qiu Tong stopped beside Terrence and said softly, “With a boss like Yu Ge, Liqing probably won’t be able to last more than half a year. No matter how he got to this position, I hope you can reconsider. Don’t risk the company over him.”
She patted Terrence’s shoulder and quickly walked out of the company building.
Yu Ge clutched his knee and jumped in pain.
He was cursing and swearing like a hooligan.
Terrence looked at him and thought of Qiu Tong’s words. Doubt flashed across his eyes.
The car across the road honked twice when it saw her.
Qiu Tong quickly crossed the sidewalk and pulled the door open to sit in the backseat. The first thing Jin Yang saw was the scar on her lips. A cold glint flashed across his eyes as he raised his hand to touch her lips. “Who hurt you?”
Qiu Tong shook her head and handed the cheques to Shao An for him to settle. She then said seriously, “Yu Ge is the General Manager of Liqing Corporation.”
Shao An was so shocked that he almost choked. He thumped his chest and turned to look at Qiu Tong from the front passenger seat. “Is it the one locked up in prison? Didn’t he just go in? How could he be released so quickly?”
Qiu Tong frowned and looked at Jin Yang. “You should confirm as soon as possible if Dina and the other members of the terrorist organization are still in jail. If things go out of control, the consequences will be too greatâ€¦”
Jin Yang’s expression was gloomy. Shao An realized the seriousness of the problem and immediately rushed to the prison to investigate.
On the way back, the car was so quiet that even the sound of breathing could be heard.. Qiu Tong and Jin Yang were consumed by their own thoughts.

chapters.title: Chapter 256 - Bail
chapters.content:
Chapter 256: Bail
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
A cold wind blew in the pitch-black night. The leaves swayed as black shadows and rustling sounds created a terrifying atmosphere.
Qiu Xingyu was so frightened that her eyes turned red as she hid under the covers. She hummed a nursery rhyme to herself. It was late into the night when the children finally fell asleep.
Shao An returned to the villa shrouded in a cold aura. He looked at Jin Yang and Qiu Tong solemnly as he reported the news from the prison.
“According to the President’s instructions, I didn’t question the prison director directly. I just casually asked him about the recent developments in the prison. There were indeed convicts who were released on bail some time ago. They all committed minor crimes or behaved well in prison. There were a total of 13 people, and they are all in the records.”
“There’s an underground illegal process in the prison. As long as you give enough money, you can reduce your sentence or even get bail.”
Qiu Tong lowered her gaze and recalled what the prison director told her about reducing Qiu Rong’s prison sentence. His words matched Shao An’s discovery.
Jin Yang narrowed his eyes, his expression void of any emotions. He tapped his leg with his fingers, indicating for Shao An to continue.
These local officials abused their position to get money. It wasn’t that Jin Yang didn’t know about this…
Shao An continued in a low and hoarse voice, “The warden said that Dina is a criminal under the President’s orders. Even if someone wants to bail him out secretly, no matter how much money is offered, they wouldn’t dare to release him. However, Yu Ge must have been separated from them for a period of time, so the warden doesn’t know the exact situation. I’ve retrieved the bail information from the prison. It was indeed Liqing Corporation who came forward.”
Jin Yang waved his hand, gesturing for him to go and rest. Qiu Tong exchanged glances with him, her eyes filled with varying degrees of confusion.
Qiu Tong sat on the bed with her laptop. She had been searching for relevant information about the Liqing Corporation in recent years and realized that the news was all positive reports. The CEO even participated in charity events every year…
She frowned as she flipped through the photos. She was surprised to see that the CEO of the Liqing Corporation had similar features to Yu Ge.
“They could be father and son.”
“Why do you want to continue being Yu Ge’s bodyguard?”
Jin Yang and Qiu Tong spoke at the same time.
Qiu Tong pursed her red lips and remained silent. She fiddled with her computer and retrieved the surveillance video of the villa’s gunfight. She pointed at the figure driving the van and said, “I saw him at the Liqing Corporation. He’s part of Yu Ge’s security team!”
Jin Yang instantly understood what she meant. He asked in return, “Do you think the foreign forces who want to snatch the human modification plan are linked to the Liqing Corporation?”
Qiu Tong nodded and zoomed in on the surveillance footage. Although the quality of the footage was a little blurry, one could still vaguely see a special tattoo on the soldier’s neck. The other soldiers also had the same mark. “It’s very likely that they’re assassins secretly trained by the Liqing Corporation.”
“Their goal in S City is definitely not as simple as setting up a branch company.”
“The professor was attacked some time ago. Shao An led his guards to track them, but some of them still managed to escape.”
“Meanwhile, the captured armed personnel all committed suicide in jail. We couldn’t gather any information at all. The conspiracy behind this is shocking! Since I can use Yu Ge to get close to them and find some clues, why not give it a try?”
Qiu Tong urged Jin Yang to agree with his plan, but he retorted with a stern expression, “I can send someone else to spy.”
“Although Yu Ge is the General Manager of the Liqing Corporation branch, I can tell that the real person in charge of the company is his assistant, Terrence.”
“You want to arrange for a spy to infiltrate the company, but the core management will definitely not recruit outsiders. Even if you successfully infiltrate the company, none of your spies will be able to get close to confidential documents. It won’t mean much! Yu Ge is filled with hatred towards me now. He will definitely find a way to find trouble with me.”
The more he hates me, the more he can distract Terrence for me and give me a chance to find clues…
Qiu Tong smiled and leaned into Jin Yang’s arms. She said softly, “I understand that you’re worried about me. I promise you that I won’t be injured.”
“Besides, you’re outside. If you sense something amiss, you can rush over to save me at any time, right?”
Jin Yang knew that he couldn’t change her mind, so he could only compromise and reiterate his conditions.
“Keep in touch with me at all times!”
Qiu Tong raised her little finger and wagged it twice. “Okay!”
The night lamp emitted a dim light. She laid in Jin Yang’s arms and listened to his steady breathing.
The connection between the human modification plan and the foreign forces made them feel a little uneasy.
Yu Ge was the only way to break through. Qiu Tong was thinking of a plan in her mind, going over every single detail so as not to arouse Terrence’s suspicion. She secretly opened her eyes to look at Jin Yang’s determined profile. There were a few times when she wanted to ask him how much he knew about the plan.
In the end, she swallowed her words…

chapters.title: Chapter 257 - Alliance
chapters.content:
Chapter 257: Alliance
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
At Liqing Corporation, Terrence handed out the standard uniform to Qiu Tong.
Qiu Tong opened it in front of him. She held the short skirt against her hips, not looking surprised at all.
She stared into Terrence’s eyes and said mockingly, “I didn’t expect your company’s taste to be so special.”
Qiu Tong threw the clothes on the ground and pushed the door open to walk to her office. She said coldly to Yu Ge, “I agreed to be your bodyguard to ensure your safety. As for clothes, I won’t trouble you to provide me with any!”
Yu Ge raised his eyebrows slightly and looked at her with a perverted expression. Seeing this, Terrence found an excuse to leave as well.
They were the only ones in the office. Qiu Tong asked tentatively, “When did you find out about your status?”
Yu Ge looked at her in surprise and suspicion before walking arrogantly to her side. “You noticed?”
“You’re indeed a smart woman! How is it? Do you want to consider being with me?”
“Those high officials in the political world will never marry commoners. They just want to play with you.”
Yu Ge recalled the person who had appeared beside her during the riot. His pupils constricted as he cleared his throat and continued to deceive her. “On the account that we had a relationship in the past, I can let you be my lover! You need to support three children. The expenses will definitely be huge, right?”
Qiu Tong concealed the pity in her eyes as she secretly mocked Yu Ge’s stupidity and arrogance.
She deliberately looked hesitant to let Yu Ge lower his guard.
Qiu Tong looked up at the computer and asked casually, “How can I trust you?”
“You’ve lied to me before. Moreover, I heard that the Liqing Corporation has a huge amount of assets and is involved in many projects. You don’t seem to have any decision-making power in the company. Instead, you’re like a puppet. I need a stable life with my children. I won’t bet with you!”
Qiu Tong twisted her fingers and tried her best to appear weak while secretly observing his reaction.
It was obvious that Yu Ge enjoyed this change in Qiu Tong.
He sat beside her and whispered exaggeratedly, “Don’t think that Terrence is in charge of the company. He listens to me! I heard them say that they want to develop a pharmaceutical project in S City yesterday…”
“These things are very profitable. If you follow me, you will definitely get a lot of money!”
Yu Ge hooked her chin with his finger. She suppressed the disgust in her heart and endured his actions for three seconds before pushing him aside again.
Qiu Tong stood up and ran to the vicinity of the computer in a panic. She quickly scanned the state of the equipment with her peripheral vision.
This computer should have adequate access to hack into the Liqing Corporation’s network and retrieve relevant information about the project. Qiu Tong frowned when she realized that the bottom drawer of the desk was locked.
Yu Ge could tell that something was off so she hurriedly found an excuse to cover up this incident.
…
In an apartment hotel in S City, Chen Jia was treating the wound on her wrist and waiting for Jin Tao’s order.
The video call on the computer was quickly connected. Chen Jia tidied herself and appeared in front of the camera. She lowered her head apologetically and said, “Sir, I didn’t complete my mission. I’m sorry!” She was a spy that Jin Tao had planted beside Jin Yang and Qiu Tong, with the goal of weakening their relationship.
Now that her plan had failed, Chen Jia could only wait for Jin Tao’s punishment.
Jin Tao’s expression did not change at all. In fact, there was even a hint of tolerance and benevolence in the corners of his eyes.
He said indifferently, “Don’t return to the capital for the time being. Stay in S City and continue to observe Jin Yang and Qiu Tong’s movements. Report to me at any time, but don’t let them detect your existence. Learn to use other people’s hands…”
“According to the information you gather, think of a way to create trouble for Qiu Tong and Jin Yang… Do you understand?”
Chen Jia nodded solemnly. When the video call ended, she looked down at the yellow dress by her feet, her eyes filled with determination to obey orders.
After receiving the new information in her email, Chen Jia scanned Lin Shan’s photo and immediately left the apartment for the police station.
Lin Shan was sentenced to 15 days in detention for disturbing the residence with malicious intent. The detention center was very rundown. She had tried to contact Shu Xian several times, but failed. Just as she lost hope, the police officer suddenly unlocked the door, indicating that she could leave.
Chen Jia waited outside the police station. She looked at Lin Shan and raised her hand as she walked over slowly. “Shall we find a place to talk?”
Lin Shan looked at her in confusion. With a faint smile on her lips, Chen Jia said softly, “Qiu Tong is our common enemy.”
Qiu Tong’s name agitated Lin Shan. She dug her fingers into her palms and said with hatred, “Alright! I’ll leave with you!”
At the roadside stall, Chen Jia expressed her intention to work with Lin Shan to frame Qiu Tong.
Recalling her failures, Lin Shan shook her head and reminded, “Qiu Tong is very smart. We can’t do it alone…”
Chen Jia used her hand to shield herself from the glaring sunlight. She asked with a smile, “What if I can help Shu Xian get the piece of land he wants? You should have a way to get him to join our side, right?”

chapters.title: Chapter 258 - Hacker Mission
chapters.content:
Chapter 258: Hacker Mission
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
At dusk, Qiu Tong came out of Liqing Corporation.
She loosened her ponytail and shook her heavy head, taking two deep breaths of the cold air.
Qiu Tong had thought of all sorts of methods to get around Yu Ge. Currently, she was seeing some results.
She located the car parked in the alley and opened the door. She threw herself into the backseat and closed her eyes.
Shao An ordered the driver to drive towards their villa in the forest.
Qiu Tong leaned her elbow against the window and said in a faint and tired voice, “You don’t have to pick me up every day…”
Shao An answered with a stern expression, “We have to carry out the President’s orders. Currently, all the forces are hidden in the dark. Although the protective measures of the villa can withstand a small-scale attack, your journey to-and-fro the villa and the company is a vulnerability. We need to ensure your safety.”
He had a stubborn personality and only acknowledged Jin Yang’s orders. Qiu Tong could only sigh in resignation.
In the villa, Jin Yang was playing with the children. When he saw her, he got up and took her coat to hang on the coat hanger in the entrance hall.
Qiu Tong hugged him intimately while Jin Yang patted her shoulder gently. At this moment, it was as if all the fatigue from the day had been dispelled.
Qiu Xingyu raised her hand shyly to cover her eyes, but in the next second, her grape-like eyes were revealed from the gaps between her fingers as they blinked. Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao covered her eyes in disdain and carried her to the back of the sofa to play…
The nanny was busy in the kitchen. Taking advantage of this free time, Qiu Tong casually picked up a ballpoint pen and some paper. She closed her eyes to recall the structure of the Liqing Corporation. Within five minutes, she had drawn a rough architectural map and route.
Jin Yang sat beside her and looked at her solemnly. “Do you have a plan?”
Qiu Tong nodded and used a ballpoint pen to poke at the location of the computer desk in Yu Ge’s office. She explained, “Through my observations over the past few days, I can confirm that Yu Ge’s computer has the right to enter the company’s network, but he doesn’t know the password.”
“I’ll find a chance to send him away tomorrow. I’ll take the opportunity to download a software for cracking the password into the computer.”
“As long as we get the passcode, we can read and retrieve all the information in the Liqing Corporation…”
Qiu Tong discussed the plan with Jin Yang. Jinyang frowned slightly as he considered the danger of implementing the plan.
They didn’t realize that Qiu Xingyu had come to their side. She held her face with her chubby hands and muttered softly, “There’s a loophole in Mommy’s plan! Passwords can be dynamic or static. If the other party set a dynamic password, it would be useless even if we can crack the password at that particular time!”
“And even if the other party used a static password, they would have installed firewalls and intercepting software. They would be able to detect an invasion… it would only take half an hour to reboot the system. There’s a high chance that Mommy’s plan will fail!”
Qiu Xingyu’s eyes were filled with innocence as she spoke. Her brows furrowed slightly as Qiu Tong scooped her up and hugged her. Her tone was filled with pride as she said, “I almost forgot that Little Yu is an expert in computers. Does Little Yu have any good methods to help Mommy?”
Qiu Xingyu gently tapped the tip of Qiu Xingyu’s nose with her finger and lowered her head to kiss her fragrant face.
Qiu Xingyu was so happy that her eyes narrowed into a straight line. She raised two fingers and shook them as she said sweetly, “You need to cooperate with me!”
“Mommy will bring Little Yu on her mission. I only need half an hour! I will definitely be able to help Mommy obtain the information she needs…”
When Qiu Tong heard her suggestion, her expression changed instantly as she placed her on the sofa and rejected, “No.”
There were too many unknowns in the Liqing Corporation. According to the information she had, there were at least a dozen skilled assassins and bodyguards inside. Qiu Xingyu was a child, how could she go to such a dangerous place?
Qiu Xingyu wanted to get Ke Le to carry Qiu Xingyu away, but she refused to let go of her sleeve.
Qiu Xingyu’s cute bun-like face was scrunched up at this moment. Her clear and distinct eyes were filled with determination as she said, “Little Yu is the best hacker! I can help Mommy. Why can’t Little Yu go with you?”
Hearing the disappointment in her voice, Qiu Tong could only gently hug and coax her. “It’s very dangerous there.”
When Qiu Xingyu heard her answer, she tightened her grip on Qiu Tong’s neck. Her tears and mucus gathered as she said, “Little Yu wants to go with Mommy!”
Qiu Tong could feel the fear in her heart. All her words turned into a soft sigh.
She did need help to infiltrate Liqing Corporation’s network and Qiu Xingyu’s computer talent made her the most suitable choice. Putting aside the fact that she was her daughter, there was no reason for her to refuse.
Qiu Xingyu bit her red lips and thought for a moment. In the end, she gave in and gently patted her head. “Alright, Mommy will bring you there.”
Qiu Xingyu wiped her snot with the back of her hand and curled her pinky excitedly.
Patter patter patter. Qiu Tong heard a flurry of footsteps behind her.. She turned around and saw Qiu Xingyuan, Qiu Xingqiao and Ye Luan standing behind her with stern expressions. They said seriously, “We’re going too!”

chapters.title: Chapter 259 - Mother And Daughter Together
chapters.content:
Chapter 259: Mother And Daughter Together
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
Qiu Tong was stunned. She nudged Jin Yang’s elbow in an attempt to get him to help.
Qiu Xingyuan pursed his thin lips into a straight line. His exquisite and cold eyes revealed his helplessness.
The silence made Qiu Tong feel pressured. Qiu Xingqiao was a straightforward person. He raised his stubborn face. “I can guard the door for Mommy and Little Yu. If bad guys come, I can stall for time! Bring me along too, alright?”
Qiu Xingyuan added, “We can take care of each other!”
Qiu Tong felt a little tired when she heard the three children’s adult-like reasoning.
She knocked on the coffee table, interrupting Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao’s heated discussion. Qiu Tong tilted her head patiently and explained, “Our mission requires us to keep below the radar. Therefore, the fewer people there are, the safer it is.”
“If we were going to a direct confrontation, Mommy will definitely bring you guys along!”
Qiu Tong gently rubbed the top of Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao’s heads. Looking at their dazed expressions, her lips curled into a gentle smile.
Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao’s eyes gradually dimmed. They folded their fingertips silently and returned to their respective bedrooms dejectedly.
…
The bedroom was filled with incense in the middle of the night. The comforting smell of sandalwood wafted in the air.
Knock knock. Qiu Tong pushed the door open and saw Qiu Xingyuan standing in his pajamas. She hurriedly bent down and hugged him, asking with concern, “Did you have a nightmare?”
Qiu Xingyuan took a step back awkwardly. He kept his distance from her with a frown. It was obvious that he was still angry.
Qiu Tong tilted her head and looked at him. Qiu Xingyuan bit his thin lips as he raised his hand to stuff the syringe and medicine into her palm.
“It’s a newly concocted anesthetic. As long as it’s injected into the skin, the other party will experience paralysis and stiffness in their limbs within five seconds, causing them to lose their ability to speak and move. I’ve done two experiments earlier. The effects will last for about half an hour.”
“There’s also a flash bomb. When you encounter danger and need to escape, it can create a blind spot for a few seconds…”
Qiu Xingyuan explained the usage of the medicine and bomb in a muffled voice. Qiu Tong felt a warmth in her heart. She hugged Qiu Xingyuan in her arms. As she listened to his strong heartbeat, she felt a happiness and satisfaction she had never felt before.
Qiu Tong narrowed her eyes and teased, “Don’t worry, Mommy will definitely return safely. Big baby, wait at home obediently. Don’t worry!”
Qiu Xingyuan’s eyes turned slightly red, but he quickly suppressed his emotions and wiped away his tears. “Who’s worried about you?”
Qiu Tong couldn’t help laughing as she stroked his face. She sent Qiu Xingyuan back to his bed and coaxed him to sleep. She thought that Jin Yang had already fallen asleep, so she quietly returned to her room. The moment she lifted the blanket, she saw a pair of deep eyes beside her…
Jin Yang wrapped his arms around her and pulled her into his embrace, her back pressed tightly against his burning chest.
The two heartbeats slowly matched.
He lifted her hair and lowered his head to kiss her neck. His gentle and slender fingers held her soft chest and kneaded it.
Jin Yang gently pinched her red buds. When he heard the seductive moan from her lips, he sighed helplessly.
Qiu Tong felt him leave for a moment before an icy cold chain was hung around her neck.
Jin Yang put on a snowflake-shaped necklace around Qiu Tong’s neck. He gently hugged her as he turned her to face him. The two of them looked into each other’s eyes. Jin Yang gently rubbed her earlobe with his fingertips and leaned forward to kiss her delicate red lips. He placed his forehead against hers. “The necklace has a tracking device. Touching it three times will activate the alert mode. I will receive the signal…”
“If you encounter any danger, remember to inform me immediately. I’ll bring Shao An to wait at the periphery, got it?”
Jin Yang inexplicably felt flustered and uneasy as he exhorted repeatedly.
Qiu Tong held the snowflake necklace in her hand and responded with a smile, “Okay.”
…
The next morning, Terrence stopped in his tracks when he saw Qiu Xingyu. He asked about the situation.
An apologetic smile appeared on Qiu Tong’s lips. She pulled Qiu Xingyu’s hood down to cover most of her face as she explained softly, “My daughter is sick and has a fever. No one in the family can help take care of her, so I brought her to work with me today.”
“Don’t worry, she’s very obedient. She won’t affect our work.”
Qiu Xingyu sensibly gave a cough and silently raised her hand to tug at his sleeve. She begged in a soft and hoarse voice, “Uncle, can you let me stay here? I want to be with Mommy!”
Terrence frowned and waved them into Yu Ge’s office.
Qiu Xingyu secretly lifted the brim of her hood and stared at Terrence’s back as he left.
“Mommy, I’ve planted a tracker device on him!”
Qiu Xingyu’s eyes sparkled with pride.. She pointed at the moving red dot on the screen. “I’m very good!”

chapters.title: Chapter 260 - Instant Danger
chapters.content:
Chapter 260: Instant Danger
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
The office was filled with cold air, making one feel as if they had fallen into an igloo.
Yu Ge looked up and saw Qiu Xingyu. He walked towards her in surprise, his eyes filled with sinister intent. He pinched Qiu Xingyu’s cheeks tightly as he whispered, “Do you still remember me?”
Qiu Xingyu shrank back and struggled to escape Yu Ge’s teasing. Her body trembled uncontrollably.
Qiu Tong sensed her uneasiness. She hurriedly used her body to shield Little Yu as she warned coldly, “Stay away from her! If you dare to touch my child, I will fight you to the death… I will never let you off!”
Yu Ge sneered sinisterly before dusting off his hands and lighting the cigar in his mouth.
Qiu Xingyu recalled that when they were still living in the dilapidated house, Yu Ge had taken the opportunity to abuse Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao in every way possible.
All sorts of memories surged into her mind, causing Qiu Xingyu to instinctively fear Yu Ge.
She closed her eyes tightly and leaned on Qiu Tong’s shoulder to calm her emotions.
Qiu Tong patted her back gently and walked straight to the desk in the corner to take a seat.
Yu Ge was unwilling to let them off. Propping his chin on his hands at the desk, he deliberately blew smoke from his cigar at Qiu Xingyu. The smoke made her cough non-stop. A murderous intent surged in Qiu Tong’s eyes. She wanted to slam the table and flip it against him. However, Qiu Xingyu sensibly tugged at her sleeve. “Mommy, I’m fine!”
“Oh, I didn’t expect your relationship to be so good now.”
“Back then, you wanted to elope with me and got Lin Shan to find a buyer. You wanted to sell them… could it be that you continued to keep them by your side because you saw that they were capable enough to earn money for you?”
“Qiu Tong, why don’t I help you find a buyer? Leave those burdens behind. We can…”
Yu Ge deliberately brought up the past to instigate Qiu Xingyu.
Qiu Tong covered Qiu Xingyu’s ear, wanting to prevent her from hearing his nonsense.
However, Qiu Xingyu turned to look straight at him. She said firmly, “Mommy won’t!”
“Mommy loves us. Back then, it was all because of you, a baddie, who bewitched her!”
Qiu Xingyu moved forward, wanting to slap Yu Ge. Yu Ge frowned and took two steps back. He licked his teeth impatiently and smashed the crystal display beside him. He raised his hand and pointed at Qiu Xingyu as he scolded loudly, “Shut up!”
“If I hear any more noise from you, I’ll throw you out the window. Do you believe me?”
Yu Ge pushed open the window, wanting to snatch Qiu Xingyu from Qiu Tong.
Qiu Tong turned her back to him and protected Qiu Xingyu in her arms, using her elbow to hit an injured spot that Yu Ge had sustained in the prison.
Yu Ge gasped and bent down to cover his wound. He was in so much pain that his entire body was twitching and his teeth were chattering.
Qiu Tong pretended to look down at him kindly and called the secretary to help him.
Now, only the mother and daughter pair were left in the office. She quickly lowered the blinds and blocked the surveillance cameras.
Qiu Xingyu shook her head to get rid of her fear and took the opportunity to run to the computer. She typed rapidly on the keyboard, her eyes sparkling as she cracked the password to the network.
Qiu Tong listened for any movement outside while searching for any hidden nooks that might contain information.
The Liqing Corporation’s network was set up by experts. The layers of firewalls and anti-tracking software made it difficult for Qiu Xingyu.
Qiu Xingyu was so anxious that her forehead was covered in cold sweat. She pouted gently and tried her best to think from the perspective of a cybersecurity expert in order to crack it. However, the progress was not smooth. She was stuck at the final stage and could not advance…
Yu Ge had been gone for about 15 minutes. Qiu Tong frowned and walked to Qiu Xingyu’s side. She couldn’t bear to hurry her.
Qiu Xingyu took some time to rub the tip of her nose with her thumb and hit the space button. A progress bar appeared on the computer screen!
Qiu Tong’s eyes widened in surprise. She quickly inserted the USB drive she carried with her into the computer. The office was so quiet that the sound of two hearts beating could be heard.
The sound of the elevator arriving suddenly rang out!
Qiu Xingyu saw the red dot on her wristwatch getting closer and closer to them. She tugged at her mother’s wrist in a panic. “Mommy, the bad guy is coming…”
Qiu Tong covered Qiu Xingyu’s mouth with her hand and quickly searched for a place to hide in the room. She stuffed her into a cabinet.
“Shh, no matter what you hear outside, don’t come out unless Mommy calls you. Got it?”
Qiu Tonghad stuffed the medicine produced by Qiu Xingyuan into her hand. Qiu Xingyu wanted to reject her, but Qiu Tong quickly closed the cabinet door. Qiu Tong then quickly turned around and sat on the sofa, just as the door to the room opened. She pretended to be calm as she looked up at Terrence.
Out of the corner of her eye, she saw that the cabinet door was not closed properly. She stood up to block Terrence’s view of the cabinet.
Although Terrence would not be surprised to see Qiu Xingyu in the office, Qiu Tong didn’t dare to take the risk!
If Terrence discovered something amiss, she could fight him to the death. However, if Terrence managed to get hold of Qiu Xingyu as a hostage, she would probably go crazy. Therefore, she had to hide Qiu Xingyu to prevent any accidents from happening…
The two of them stared at each other for half a minute. Terrence looked at the empty office and frowned suspiciously at Qiu Tong.
“Where’s Mr. Yu Ge?”
Terrence asked while Qiu Tong tried her best to calm her rapid breathing.. She answered steadily, “His old injury acted up and he’s getting treatment for it.”

chapters.title: Chapter 261 - Secret Room
chapters.content:
Chapter 261: Secret Room
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
Terrence approached the French windows. He pulled the rope and gently opened the blinds. The shadows cast by the light made it impossible to see his expression at that moment. He said in a relaxed tone, “Why did you pull down the blinds?”
Qiu Tong chuckled and looked up indifferently. “Why don’t you ask Yu Ge?”
“Why did he force you to hire me as his personal bodyguard? With the security you have, you can totally protect him.”
“Yu Ge wanted to take revenge on me, humiliate me and trap me by his side. He covered the window earlier as he wanted to have sex with me. I beat him up, which is why his old injuries…”
Qiu Tong fabricated a lie. “You can ask him for confirmation.”
Qiu Tong shrugged and threw herself onto the sofa. She deliberately moved her shirt to reveal the love bites left behind by Jin Yang last night.
She challenged Terrence indifferently with her gaze, a sarcastic smile on her lips.
“But with Yu Ge’s personality, he will probably scold you harshly and then chase you off in his capacity as the General Manager of the Liqing Corporation. I advise you not to try. He hasn’t been successful recently and is in a bad mood…”
Terrence pushed his gold-framed glasses up his nose and stared at Qiu Tong with suspicion and uncertainty.
Yu Ge had briefly mentioned her identity and his past experiences with her to him. Terrence felt that her appearance in the Liqing Corporation would affect them, but Yu Ge was stubborn. As a result, Terrence had no choice but to just remain vigilant against her.
Terrence hesitated for a moment before his expression quickly changed to that of a gentleman. He smiled and said, “Miss Qiu, you must be joking.”
“We have no right to ask Mr. Yu Ge about his affairs.”
Terrence turned around to leave, but the computer suddenly beeped!
A sinister glint flashed across his eyes as he closed the door. “Miss Qiu, you’d better not move…”
Qiu Tong pretended to be calm as she looked to the side. Terrence slowly walked towards the computer. She secretly took out the dagger she carried with her from her sleeve, prepared to fight him at any moment.
The atmosphere in the office instantly became filled with the smell of gunpowder. Terrence saw the computer flash with a red light. Just as he was about to see the display screen, there was suddenly a commotion in the corridor. There were people cursing and loud fighting noises…
“Mr. Yu Ge! Don’t be rash. You will tear your wound apart!”
The secretary stopped him in a panic. Terrence narrowed his eyes and chose to let Qiu Tong off for the time being to run out and deal with the emergency.
Qiu Tong heaved a sigh of relief as she placed her hand on her rapidly beating heart.
Through the glass window, Qiu Tong saw a figure flash past. She felt that it looked familiar, but she had no time to care about the trouble Yu Ge was in. She bent down and opened the cabinet, wanting to carry Qiu Xingyu out.
“Little Yu?!”
Qiu Tong opened the cabinet. It was empty.
She immediately looked around anxiously and knocked on every wooden board. Soon, Qiu Xingyu’s soft voice came from the bottom of a bookcase. The loose wooden boards moved a little, and Qiu Xingyu stuck her head out. Her cute face was streaked with dust. “Mommy! There’s a dark room here! There are many scary things inside…”
Qiu Xingyu stared at the red dot on her watch and said in a hoarse voice, “Hurry, the bad guy won’t be back for the time being!”
Qiu Tong looked at the narrow passageway and quickly jumped in after Qiu Xingyu.
After a long, dark slide, they opened their eyes. The scene before them was so shocking that they couldn’t close their mouths. This place was extremely similar to Professor Dong’s secret room.
Around them were countless human specimens soaked in formaldehyde, and glass jars containing human organs…
Qiu Xingyu tugged at Qiu Tong’s hand nervously as she glanced at the red dot on her device from time to time. Qiu Tong was quietly shocked. It seemed like the Liqing Corporation was indeed targeting the human modification plan. Moreover, they had already obtained a certain amount of information and had begun their own research and development!
There were test tubes on the island counter. Qiu Tong looked at the data of their experiments and memorized them.
Qiu Xingyu stood on her tiptoes and leaned against the desk. Suddenly, she caught a glimpse of a familiar handwriting. She lowered her voice in excitement and greeted, “Mommy, it’s Grandpa’s handwriting! I recognize his notebook!”
Qiu Tong picked up the detailed notes. When she flipped to the title page, there was indeed Qiu Rong’s name written on the front.
It seemed like the human modification plan was undeniably linked to Qiu Rong!
Qiu Xingyu quietly held the notebook in her arms. They were afraid that Terrence would return, so they hurried back through the original passageway. Qiu Tong knew that too many strange things had happened today which would definitely put the Liqing Corporation on the alert. She hid the notebook in the bookcase and sat on the sofa with Qiu Xingyu in her arms to sort out her thoughts as she waited for Yu Ge and Terrence to return.
“Mommy, I miss Grandpa!”
Qiu Xingyu looked tired. The high intensity and extreme tension made her a little dazed and she was about to fall asleep.
She mumbled, “When will Grandpa be back?”
Qiu Tong tidied her messy hair and straightened the pink bow. She kissed Qiu Xingyu gently and promised. “I’ll get him back as soon as possible! This matter is definitely linked to him.”
She also wanted to figure out Qiu Rong’s role in the human transformation plan!

chapters.title: Chapter 262 - Vulture Organization
chapters.content:
Chapter 262: Vulture Organization
Qiu Tong retrieved her USB drive and used the excuse that Qiu Xingyu needed to go to the hospital to leave the Liqing Corporation earlier.
In the corner of the parking lot, countless cigarette butts were piled on the ground. When Jin Yang saw Qiu Tong, he instantly rushed over and hugged her tightly. Qiu Tong smelled the strong tobacco smell on his body. She patted his broad back gently. “Loosen up a little. I can’t breathe!”
Jin Yang slowly tightened his grip, as if he wanted to melt into her. “It’s good that you’re fine.”
Shao An held Qiu Xingyu’s hand and stood nearby. He had the courage to tease Jin Yang.
“Miss Qiu, you have no idea. The President kept asking me for the time and whether there is a signal every two minutes. If you were just a little later, he would have barged in with the armed forces!”
Qiu Tong’s eyes widened in surprise as she got into the vehicle with Jin Yang and drove towards the villa. “You’re not the ones who caused the commotion to help us escape?”
Shao An, who was in the front passenger seat, waved his hand. He pointed at the walkie-talkie and informed all the guards to leave the designated location and move deeper into the forest.
“All the squads are lying in ambush at the designated locations. There were no guards who acted on their own.”
Jin Yang held her hand tightly and asked about what had happened at the Liqing Corporation.
As Qiu Tong described what happened, silence fell in the vehicle. Shao An couldn’t help holding his breath in worry.
If it were him, he wouldn’t have been able to complete the mission as calmly as Qiu Tong had. Jin Yang stared at her with a dark expression. “Don’t go to the Liqing Corporation again!”
Jin Yang couldn’t take such a major risk.
Qiu Tong’s lips curled into a comforting smile. She leaned her head gently against Jin Yang’s shoulder and gradually fell asleep.
…
At the villa, Qiu Tong and Jin Yang crowded in front of the computer as they seriously analyzed the information on the Liqing Corporation’s network.
Ke Le and the mercenaries looked over curiously. When they saw the special pattern on the screen, they said in surprise, “This is the totem symbol of the terrorist organization, Vulture. When we were doing missions on the Dark Web, we once ran into the ex-Vulture soldiers. They’re all vicious guys!”
“I heard that every of the Vulture soldiers will have this totem tattooed on them. It’s used to determine their identity.”
Ke Le’s words made Qiu Tong very anxious. She asked, “Do you know who the founder or boss of Vulture is?”
The mercenaries shook their heads in confusion. Ke Le scratched his head foolishly and said in an apologetic voice, “Boss, Vulture soldiers are people in desperate situations. We have little interaction with them. We only heard that Vulture was founded ten years ago and has a huge influence. Their boss is very mysterious. Only a few of Vulture’s higher-ups are in contact with him. The low-level soldiers don’t know anything about him…”
It seemed like Vulture was a very mysterious group. Qiu Tong could vaguely sense that there was definitely a hidden conspiracy.
Qiu Xingyu helped to sort out the information from the network. Jin Yang looked at the information regarding the human modification plan and couldn’t help frowning. He looked at Shao An solemnly. “The information here is even more detailed than what we have!”
Shao An looked embarrassed. The information they had obtained behind Jin Tao’s back was lacking.
Qiu Tong narrowed her eyes. She felt as if a huge net was approaching them, looming over their heads.
She stared at Jin Yang for a long time before finally choosing to trust the man in front of her. She asked, “What do you want to use the drug for?”
“To transform the army and start more wars? To create super strong human weapons?”
Faced with her questions, Jin Yang’s gaze did not waver at all. The contour of his face was firm and serious as he answered, “I yearn for peace. The original intention of the human modification plan was to optimize and improve humans, so that currently incurable diseases could be cured or prevented.”
“I’ve never thought of starting a war or violating the laws of nature.”
“Qiu Tong, I know you’re hiding something from me. If you’re unwilling to tell me, I won’t force you. But please believe me. We’re on the same side. We’re both working hard for the same goal.”
Jin Yang looked at her lovingly and gently. Her clenched fists gradually relaxed, and her lips curled into a smile.
“The modification plan is probably related to my father. I want to get him out…”
“Perhaps he can help us answer our questions.”
Jin Yang had already guessed a little. He looked at Shao An, indicating for him to settle the matter, but Qiu Tong stopped them. “The Vulture Organization and those people who want to kidnap the children are all watching us from the shadows. Your actions will probably attract a lot of trouble. Leave this to me.”
“I’ll ask Yu Ge for the rest of my salary tomorrow and retrieve my father’s notebook.”
Jin Yang rejected her idea. He frowned and said coldly, “I can’t let you go to Liqing Corporation again.. Terrence is suspicious of you, he definitely won’t let you off so easily…”

chapters.title: Chapter 263 - Sowing Discord
chapters.content:
Chapter 263: Sowing Discord
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
“I have a way to deal with them. I guarantee that I won’t be injured and will leave the Liqing Corporation safely.”
“For the Liqing Corporation to find Yu Ge at such a time, it is definitely not as simple as a father finding his son. On the surface, they have established a legitimate branch company, but they are secretly carrying out experiments on the human modification plan. Based on the information we have now, they have already progressed to stage two! It will be too late if we don’t stop them.”
“I need to think of a way to drive a wedge between Yu Ge and Terrence and make them doubt each other.”
“As long as we plant doubt in Yu Ge’s heart, he will be able to help us slow down Terrence’s movements. This will be very helpful to our future actions. And this mission is something that only I can execute.”
“Jin Yang, you can’t blindly reject the most suitable plan because of our relationship.”
Qiu Tong stared at Jin Yang. Her words had rendered him speechless.
Jin Yang stood up angrily. For the first time in his life, he felt that his status as President was useless.
He couldn’t even protect the woman he loved right now!
Qiu Tong sensed his low spirits and took the initiative to walk to his side, hugging his waist from behind…
Qiu Tong buried her face in his broad back and comforted him softly, “After tomorrow, I’ll listen to you and Shao An regarding everything!”
Jin Yang closed his eyes tightly. He pushed her away and removed an exquisite pistol from his waist, handing it to her along with the magazine.
This gun was specially customized for Jin Yang. The trajectory had been improved by professionals, and the speed at which it was fired was 0.5 seconds faster than a normal gun. The trigger position had also been adjusted and fixed.
It had never left Jin Yang’s side. He held her hand and said in a deep voice, “This is the last time.”
Qiu Tong raised her eyebrows gently and nodded in response.
Qiu Xingyuan, Qiu Xingqiao and Little Yu hid behind the sofa. They pouted, their hearts heavy and nervous.
Qiu Xingyu couldn’t control her emotions. She ran barefoot to her mother’s side and hugged her waist. “Mommy!”
Qiu Xingqiao hesitated for a moment before pulling Qiu Xingyuan’s arm. The two of them pounced into Qiu Tong’s arms.
The three children surrounded her. Even without words, she could feel their concern.
…
The next day at noon, Qiu Tong took the elevator to the 20th floor. The moment she stepped out of the elevator, she noticed that there were many bodyguards around her.
They all had the Vulture totem tattoo on the backs of their necks. Qiu Tong entere the office and saw Terrance flipping through a magazine.
Hearing footsteps, Terrence looked up at her with a smile.
“I didn’t expect you to dare to come here…”
A cold glint flashed across Terrence’s eyes, but she pretended to look at him in surprise and confusion. “What? Is there a problem with me coming to work?”
Yu Ge tapped his fingers on the table as he examined Terrence and Qiu Tong. He did not act rashly but just sat there as if he was watching a show. Terrence tugged at his tie and asked bluntly, “What on earth did you do in the office yesterday?! As Mr. Yu Ge’s personal bodyguard, how dare you do such sneaky things? Explain yourself!”
Qiu Tong frowned in surprise. She looked at Yu Ge and deliberately asked, “What did I do? Do you have any evidence?”
Qiu Tong had guessed that Yu Ge didn’t know about the secret room and the Liqing Corporation’s situation overseas. Therefore, Terrence was tricking her!
Indeed, Terrence choked on his words.
Qiu Tong took this opportunity to instigate him. “Seeing how nervous Terrence is, I’m afraid that there must be some secret in this office that you are hiding from Yu Ge, right? As the General Manager, Yu Ge has been staying in the office for the past few days…”
“All business processes require your signature. Yu Ge is clearly just a figurehead.”
Yu Ge’s expression instantly darkened.
When she and Qiu Xingyu had sneaked into the secret room yesterday, she remembered to erase their fingerprints and footprints. Terrence couldn’t find any clues that pointed to them, which was why she dared to rebut him.
“I used to think that Yu Ge was the boss and that being his bodyguard would be very profitable. Now it looks like… it’s all fake.”
Qiu Tong looked at Yu Ge with disdain. Her gaze was like a knife cutting into Yu Ge’s heart, causing him to rush to Terrence in agitation. “Is what she said true? Are you guys hiding anything from me?! I’m the boss!”
Yu Ge grabbed Terrence’s collar. His emotions were easily manipulated. Qiu Tong knew this very well. She picked up a nutshell on the coffee table and flicked it towards Yu Ge’s wound. The sharp pain instantly infuriated him.
“Hurry up and separate them!”
Qiu Tong reminded the bodyguards standing beside her, and they instantly went over.
She took the opportunity to retrieve the notebook hidden in the bookshelf. Qiu Tong stood at the door and crossed her arms.. When she met Yu Ge’s eyes, she said lightly, “Come and find me again when you have true control in the Liqing Corporation and make Terrence listen to your orders.”

chapters.title: Chapter 264 - Stupid Fellows
chapters.content:
Chapter 264: Stupid Fellows
At the fountain garden of the Liqing Corporation, Shu Xian and Lin Shan were squatting on the opposite side of the road with a group of men, waiting for Qiu Tong to appear.
Chen Jia sat in the car parked in the shadows. She observed her surroundings vigilantly, unwilling to miss any suspicious figures.
After yesterday’s failure, she would never allow any mistakes to her plan again!
Shu Xian rolled down the window and casually flicked the cigarette butt outside. He stared at Chen Jia with a lecherous gaze and wanted to flirt with her.
Sitting beside him, Lin Shan could tell what he was thinking. She hurriedly threw herself into his arms and whispered coquettishly, “Don’t worry, it will definitely go smoothly today.”
Chen Jia controlled her disgusted expression and said indifferently, “I hope so.”
If she had any other choice, she would never collaborate with these two extremely stupid fellows!
Two days ago, Chen Jia met Shu Xian under Lin Shan’s guidance. She convinced Shu Xian to help them target Qiu Tong by promising him the piece of government land. Chen Jia had secretly investigated and found out that Qiu Tong had been frequenting this office building recently, so she asked Lin Shan and Shu Xian to find a group of people to create trouble at the company.
Her original goal was to force her to stop working and kidnap her…
However, Chen Jia never expected that this stupid b*tch, Lin Shan, would get into a fight with Yu Ge and be thrown out of the door by the Liqing Corporation’s bodyguards! She looked at the rearview mirror resentfully, wishing she could throw Lin Shan and Shu Xian out. Chen Jia clenched her fists and tried her best to suppress her emotions.
Qiu Tong soon walked out of the building.
The crossroad was blocked by a car accident. It would take some time for Shao An to drive around it. Qiu Tong stood at the intersection and waited.
Chen Jia turned around and gave Lin Shan and Shu Xian a look. They immediately opened the car door and ran to Qiu Tong’s side.
Shu Xian grabbed her elbow forcefully and pushed her towards the vehicle opposite the road.
Qiu Tong was taken aback by the sudden turn of events. She was stunned and flustered for a moment, but quickly calmed down. When she saw Shu Xian and Lin Shan, she thought of the figures she saw flashing past the office yesterday. She asked in surprise, “It’s you two?!”
The Liqing Corporation was located in a bustling city center, and passers-by quickly surrounded them.
Shu Xian shouted hoarsely, “Come home with me quickly! Don’t embarrass yourself outside again!”
Qiu Tong frowned and stared at Lin Shan, not understanding what they were playing at.
Lin Shan met her gaze and immediately said to the passers-by in an exaggerated tone, “She’s my sister-in-law. We found out that she was having an affair. She actually wanted to elope with the family money!”
“Tell us, should she go back with us to explain things clearly?”
Qiu Tong looked at the car hidden in the shadows and instantly understood their intentions.
They actually fabricated such a ridiculous lie to kidnap her?
A mocking smile appeared on Qiu Tong’s lips as she pushed Lin Shan away. She then grabbed Lin Shan’s hair and leaned over to whisper in her ear, “When will you be able to use your brain?”
“The police station is less than 200 meters away. We can go there to discuss this.”
After several confrontations with Qiu Tong, Lin Shan subconsciously felt a sense of fear towards her. Lin Shan desperately signaled to Shu Xian with her eyes, wanting him to help.
Shu Xian waved his hand, wanting to get the men lying in ambush to rush over.
The security department of the Liqing Corporation sensed that something was wrong in the garden. They took out their batons and rushed over.
Qiu Tong deliberately exposed her location to attract the attention of the security guards. She then placed her hat on Lin Shan’s head and hit the back of her neck. Lin Shan instantly fell to the ground in a daze.
Shao An drove to the appointed place and was about to get out of the car when he saw the chaos in front of him.
Qiu Tong fiddled with her loose curls as she pulled open the door to the front passenger seat. She raised her eyebrows at him and said, “Let’s go.”
Shao An nodded in confusion but immediately started the car. They passed by the Liqing Corporation building and saw the two groups of people fighting. They felt that it was comical and ridiculous.
On the other side of the road, Chen Jia was so angry that she smacked the steering wheel.
She gritted her teeth and scolded, “They’re all useless!”
…
Qiu Tong successfully returned to the villa with the notebook. Everyone was immersed in a happy and joyful atmosphere.
Ke Le suggested making dumplings to celebrate, and everyone quickly agreed.
Qiu Xingyu waved her arms excitedly as she ran to the kitchen and sprinkled the entire bag of flour on the counter. Looking at her kitten-like face, Qiu Tong couldn’t help smiling. She gently dusted the flour off her head.
Jin Yang carried Qiu Xingqiao to wash his hands, before leading Qiu Xingyuan and Ye Luan to make dumplings.
The sunset in the forest was dazzling. Through the French windows, Qiu Tong looked at the serious expressions on Jin Yang and the children’s faces. From the corner of her eye, she glanced at the notebook placed in the living room. How long could this comfortable life last? They couldn’t be sure.
Qiu Xingyu handed a weird-shaped dumpling to Qiu Tong as if she was presenting a treasure, hoping to receive praise.
Qiu Tong watched as the stuffing flowed out onto her hands. She forced a smile and stroked her face. “Little Yu, bring your brothers to the living room to play, okay? Mommy and Uncle Jin Yang will call you when we are done…”
If they continued to mess around, tonight’s dinner would probably only be served tomorrow!

chapters.title: Chapter 265 - Give Her A Younger Sister
chapters.content:
Chapter 265: Give Her A Younger Sister
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
The atmosphere in the dining room was lively. Qiu Xingyu stepped on the dining chair as she fought with Qiu Xingqiao for the dumplings.
With a smile, Qiu Tong refilled Qiu Xingyuan and Ye Luan’s plates, before using a napkin to wipe the soy sauce stains on Qiu Xingyu’s lips. Qiu Xingyu patted her plump belly and looked up at Qiu Tong. “Is Mommy not hungry?”
Jin Yang looked up at her. She hadn’t eaten anything.
Sensing his gaze, Qiu Tong explained, “Mommy ate all the dumplings Little Yu made when I was cooking.”
Qiu Tong had eaten all the weird-shaped dumplings that Qiu Xingyu made.
Qiu Xingyu lifted her chin proudy. She glanced at Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao while swinging Qiu Tong’s hand, as if she was showing off to them.
At the dining table, Shao An and Ke Le raised their glasses to toast each other, expressing their appreciation and admiration for each other. Jin Yang also drank two glasses of wine in high spirits. Qiu Xingyu looked at the cartoon playing on the television screen and suddenly thought of something. She held Jin Yang and Qiu Tong’s hands and placed them together.
Qiu Xingyu blinked and said seriously, “Can Mommy and Uncle Jin Yang give me a younger sister?”
Her childish voice was crisp and clear. The dining room instantly fell silent as everyone stared at Qiu Tong and Jin Yang.
Qiu Tong coughed awkwardly. She wanted to cover Qiu Xingyu’s mouth, but the little brat struggled free. She frowned and complained. “I’m the youngest in the family. My older brothers always scold me and I have to listen to them…”
“If Uncle Jin Yang and Mommy can give me a little sister, I can become an older sister then!”
“She will be the youngest child in the family. I can lecture her and tell her not to eat too much candy or her teeth will rot!”
Qiu Xingyu was innocent and naive. Qiu Tong had no choice but to gloss over this subject.
Late into the night, Qiu Tong did the washing up in the kitchen before dragging her tired body back to the bedroom on the second floor. Just as she pushed open the door, she smelled a faint fragrance. Her back was pressed against Jin Yang’s burning chest. She turned to meet Jin Yang’s deep and drunken eyes.
Jin Yang carried her to the bed and said in an ambiguous and hoarse voice, “I think we should fulfill Little Yu’s wish.”
Qiu Tong couldn’t help laughing when she saw him pretending to be serious. She didn’t resist as she hooked her arms around his neck and lifted her hand to unbutton his shirt. The light was dim. Qiu Tong’s fingertips tugged at his shirt as she curled her index finger and threw it to the ground. Jin Yang’s firm muscles intoxicated her…
Jin Yang bent down to kiss her lips, but she pushed him away with a sly smile and pressed him onto the bed.
Qiu Tong was a good student. She remembered Jin Yang’s previous moves and imitated them.
Her nimble tongue licked Jin Yang’s Adam’s apple and gently bit at his collarbone. Jin Yang panted as he supported her slender waist with his hands and slowly moved them down to her plump buttocks. He kneaded them and the pleasure made her moist.
Jin Yang narrowed his eyes. He raised his hand and tucked a loose strand of hair behind her ear so that he could see her expression.
As if sensing his intentions, Qiu Tong deliberately licked her red lips with the tip of her tongue, deliberately provoking him. She slowly bent down to kiss Jin Yang’s tight abs, using her warm hand to gently hold his erection.
Qiu Tong smiled wickedly as she rubbed him.
Jin Yang took a deep breath as his eyes darkened.
Qiu Tong giggled. From the corner of her eye, she saw a shallow scar on Jin Yang’s waist. She hadn’t noticed it before. She slowed down her movements and asked with a pained expression, “How did you get that scar?”
“I forgot.” Jin Yang picked her up and placed her gently under him. “I’ve encountered many dangers. There are two scars from knife wounds on my back and a closed bullet hole at my waist. There are also shrapnel pieces in my body…”
Qiu Tong frowned and covered Jin Yang’s thin lips, wanting to stop him.
Jin Yang took the opportunity to kiss her palm and caress her hair.
He then took advantage of her distraction to spread her legs apart and move in.
“None of those are important. Perhaps I had to get all these scars to meet you…”
A smile flashed across Jin Yang’s eyes. These words were like stones striking Qiu Tong’s heart.
She wrapped her arms around Jin Yang’s neck as a bewitching moan escaped from her lips. They moved rhythmically.
A burning sensation shot into her body as a thought surfaced in her mind. Perhaps it wasn’t a bad idea to give Little Yu a younger sister.
Jin Yang seemed to have read her mind. After a short rest, he continued to work tirelessly…
“Do it a few more times so that our chances of success will be higher!”
Jin Yang was nibbling on Qiu Tong’s earlobes as he whispered those seductive words.

chapters.title: Chapter 266 - S City Prison Visit
chapters.content:
Chapter 266: S City Prison Visit
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
The next morning, Qiu Tong woke up and walked to the living room, feeling slightly tired and her waist aching.
Jin Yang sat with his back facing the stairs. Qiu Tong rubbed her sleepy eyes and said reproachfully, “You sure recover quickly…”
As soon as she said that, she saw Shao An and Ke Le standing opposite Jin Yang. They were holding the name list for the patrol shift. Cheeky smiles spread across their faces. Qiu Tong’s face instantly turned red with embarrassment. She lifted her leg and kicked Kohler lightly as she whispered, “Get lost!”
Ke Le chuckled as he led the mercenaries out to patrol the area. Qiu Tong glared at him with a frown.
On the weekend, Shao An accompanied her to S City Prison.
When the warden heard the news of their arrival, he was so nervous that he hurriedly tidied up his office and arranged his outfit in front of the mirror, before waiting respectfully at the door. From time to time, he would run his hand through his hair and peer out.
Qiu Tong shook his hand politely. Sitting on the leather sofa, the warden brewed hot tea and handed it to her in an ingratiating manner.
Shao An stood beside her with his hands behind his back. He stared straight ahead, his entire body emitting an intimidating aura.
Nervous, the warden mentally reviewed his recent work. There shouldn’t be any mistakes. He was so anxious that his hands were trembling. “Is there something the President needs? Please feel free to tell me. The S City prison will definitely cooperate. Please don’t worry.”
Qiu Tong sipped the hot tea and looked up at the warden with indifferent eyes. She said gently, “Don’t be nervous.”
“I came here today for a private matter. It has nothing to do with anyone else.”
When the warden heard her words, he glanced at Shao An nervously.
As the president’s personal guard, how could Shao An appear at any other place? Shao An must have followed the president’s orders to protect her. What on earth was so important?
Qiu Tong did not delay any longer. She took out two cheques from her bag and pushed them toward the warden.
“These are two cheques for five million yuan. You can cash them at any bank.”
“I want to bail out my father, Qiu Rong. I’ve asked you about this procedure a while ago…”
The warden looked shocked. He stood up in a panic and returned the cheques. His gaze drifted to Shao An as he explained. “That rule is no longer effective. We know that there are loopholes in our management, and we have been trying our best to improve the situation in the prison recently. We will never allow anyone to bail out criminals through private connections!”
“Please rest assured, Mr. President and Miss Qiu. Yu Ge’s situation will never happen again.”
The warden misunderstood Qiu Tong’s intentions and hurriedly bowed.
Qiu Tong rubbed her forehead awkwardly and took two more sips of the hot tea. Afraid that he wouldn’t believe her, she said sincerely, “I really want to bail out my father. Can you make an exception?”
Shao An frowned as he glanced at the warden. The warden hesitated.
The warden tapped on his laptop in a dilemma. He searched for the system records and handed them to her.
“We have already fixed the earlier bail loophole in the prison. We created a system to log in information about the prisoners. Now, all the information is public and transparent.”
“It will probably be a little difficult to secretly reduce a prisoner’s sentence.”
The warden explained the situation with difficulty. Seeing the disappointment on Qiu Tong’s face, he added with a hint of fear, “But we can think of other ways. For example, we send a list of candidates to have their prison sentences reduced to the capital every few months.”
“We just need to wait for the right time.”
Qiu Tong had no intention of making things difficult for the warden. She nodded and thanked him softly, “Thank you for your help.”
“Can I meet him?”
The warden heaved a sigh of relief. He had arranged for the prison guard to bring Qiu Rong to the visitor’s room. Qiu Tong couldn’t help tearing up at the sight of him. She looked at his weathered hands and said in a low voice, “Wait for a little longer. I’ll definitely bring you out.”
Qiu Rong touched her cheek and shook his head gently. “It’s alright, I am fine.”
Qiu Tong signaled Shao An to lead the prison guards out, giving them some privacy. She then hinted at Qiu Rong, “I went back to the old residence to take a look and found some notes you left behind.”
“But it seems like someone has secretly copied your notes. The information in your notes has spread quite widely. I’m a little worried.”
Qiu Tong held Qiu Rong’s hand and traced the word “human” on his palm. Qiu Rong was instantly agitated and wanted to speak, but Qiu Tong shook her head to gestured for him to calm down. At the same time, she looked at the surveillance camera in the room and said in a voice that only the two of them could hear, “I’m afraid someone will secretly retrieve this surveillance video. Play along with me!”
Qiu Rong nodded solemnly. His turbid eyes seemed to glow as if there was a ray of light blooming from the center.. His entire body started to radiate vitality.

chapters.title: Chapter 267 - Early Warning
chapters.content:
Chapter 267: Early Warning
Translator:
Atlas Studios
Editor:
Atlas Studios
Qiu Tong continued softly, “Daddy, a child from a distant relative came to seek refuge with me.”
“Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao like him a lot. He is safe with us. Don’t worry.”
Qiu Tong dipped her finger in some water and traced the word “Ye” on the table at a spot where the cameras couldn’t see.
Qiu Rong quickly guessed what she meant. He was so agitated that tears welled up in the corners of his eyes. He said in a choked voice, “Okay, take care of him for me!”
Shao An was standing guard outside. Qiu Tong looked back at him and quietly frowned.
The warden of S City was personally picked by Jin Yang and could be considered a trusted aide.
Even though he was short-sighted when it came to handling many things, he was trustworthy and they did not need to be so guarded against him.
However, Qiu Tong still felt uneasy. There were many prison guards in the prison, and it was unknown if their backgrounds were clean. They couldn’t make any mistakes now. The slightest carelessness would result in an irreversible mistake.
The clock on the wall ticked as Qiu Tong took out two bags of powder and syringes and stuffed them into his palm.
“Qiu Xingyuan recently developed this drug. You should be able to discern the effects. Keep it close to you!”
Qiu Rong narrowed his eyes and understood what she was worried about. He smiled lovingly and patted her shoulder.
The relationship between the father and daughter was gradually growing closer.
It was time to end the visit. The prison guard helped Qiu Rong stand up and sent him back to the cell. In handcuffs and ankle cuffs, Qiu Rong looked back at her from time to time as he dragged his heavy feet. He raised his arm to signal her to leave quickly.
Tears glistened in her eyes. Just as she was about to stand up and leave, she subconsciously felt that something was wrong.
Across the long corridor, Qiu Tong stared at the prison guard beside Qiu Rong for a long time. His back view and actions seemed familiar…
…
Outside the prison, Qiu Tong and Shao An drove off. A figure walked out of the shade and sent the photos taken secretly to the capital.
Chen Jia took off her sunglasses and a mask that covered half of her face. She dialed Jin Tao’s number. “Sir, Qiu Tong talked to Qiu Rong in the S City prison for half an hour. I’ll think of a way to get the surveillance cameras in the visitor room and figure out her motives.”
Jin Tao sat in the study, tapping the mouse as he flipped through several photos from different angles.
He said in an emotionless tone, “You don’t have to worry about the prison. Continue to cause trouble for Qiu Tong according to the plan. No matter how simple the trick is, as long as it can mess up her plans and affect her, it’s enough.”
“I’ll let you return to the capital once this matter is settled. Wait for my news and don’t act rashly.”
Chen Jia was a little confused, but she agreed to carry out Jin Tao’s orders.
At the old residence in the capital, Jin Tao threw the photos into the bottom drawer of a table. “I didn’t expect them to connect all the clues together. They actually found the prison so quickly?” He played with the pen in his hand and jabbed his temples with his fingertips, a playful smile appearing in his eyes.
Half an hour later, in the prison lounge in S City, a man in a prison guard uniform received a call. He quietly went out to answer it.
Jin Tao informed him coldly, “Do it tonight. Don’t be too ruthless. Leave him alive.”
The prison guard asked curiously, “Sir, his daughter is already thinking of a way to bail him out. If he leaves the prison, it will be very unfavorable for us. Why don’t we take the opportunity to kill him and cut off any future troubles?”
