In the past, he had hated her. He had even tried his best to chase her away and make her die. But as time passed, Qiu Xingyuan could feel the love she had for him and his younger siblings. It was from the bottom of her heart, and it completely melted his heart.
Although Qiu Xingyuan still maintained a remote relationship with her on the surface, he was gradually relying more and more on her in his heart.
The moment he learned that Qiu Tong had fallen into a coma, Qiu Xingyuan felt a deep sense of fear. He didn’t want to become a motherless child!
Qiu Xingyuan wiped Little Yu’s tears and said with certainty, “She just needs to rest. We have to wait obediently for her to wake up. We have to do things for her that she likes. She will naturally recover faster.”
Qiu Xingyu trusted Qiu Xingyuan the most. Hope lit up in her eyes.
The medical machines continued to beep.
Qiu Xingyu ran to the bed and gently massaged Qiu Tong’s arms and legs. She muttered, “I heard from Grandpa that a massage will speed up blood circulation. Mommy will ache from lying down all day. She’ll feel more comfortable this way.”
When Qiu Xingqiao heard this, he joined in as well. Little Yu clumsily climbed onto the bed, avoiding the various tubes, and pressed her cold face against Qiu Tong’s chest. She listened to Qiu Tong’s steady heartbeat as she hummed a nursery rhyme, as if she was coaxing her to sleep…
At the door of the ward, Jin Yang quietly stood outside and watched the children’s actions. His heart ached.
Qiu Rong dragged his tired body out of the laboratory and followed Jin Yang’s line of sight to see the scene in the room.
Jin Yang turned around and looked at Qiu Rong when he heard the noise. Qiu Rong used his eyes to signal him to follow him to the balcony on the top floor. The sky was sparkling with a few bright stars, and a light wind blew. The dark circles under Jin Yang’s eyes indicated that he hadn’t slept for several days.
Qiu Rong hesitated for a moment before saying, “Qiu Tong used a semi-finished product. The ratio of the ingredients added to it is too violent for the human body to bear. When we were experimenting on the mice, they… didn’t survive.”
“It was my mistake. I wanted to destroy the sample but I felt that it was the closest to the effect we wanted, so I decided to keep it overnight. I didn’t expect Tongtong to take it away and use it on herself.”
Qiu Rong rubbed his eyes. He had been trying his best to accept reality the past few days. He could not help feeling gloomy and solemn.
“What I want to tell you is that Tongtong’s vital signs are normal now, but that doesn’t mean she can wake up.”
“Even if she wakes up, no one can be certain what the drug has done to her body and whether her nervous system is irreversibly damaged. You are the president and Tongtong is my daughter…”
“If she could talk, I know she would want you to continue your life.”
Qiu Rong hinted for Jin Yang to leave. He even thought of taking the children out of the villa and finding a secluded place to take care of them.
However, just as he was about to speak, Jin Yang stopped him and said seriously, “Uncle Qiu, Qiu Tong and I have already completed the marriage procedures. She is my lawful wife.”
“I won’t divorce her.”
Jin Yang’s thin lips curled into a faint smile. “I didn’t hold a wedding ceremony with her when we decided to get married. I hope you can allow me to hold a family wedding. I want to officially marry her and take care of her and the children as her husband.”
“As you said, we don’t know if she can wake up again. I don’t want us to have any regrets.”
Jin Yang’s deep affection moved Qiu Rong. After a moment of silence, he nodded and said, “Up to you.”
The next morning, Shao An was shocked to receive the news, but he quickly started to organize the wedding ceremony.
When Song Yan heard the news outside, he immediately rushed back to the villa. He forgot all the comforting words he had carefully planned on the way back. He just silently raised his hand and patted Jin Yang’s shoulder.
Jin Yang was dressed in a tuxedo. “You’re back at the right time. Welcome to my wedding.”

chapters.title: Chapter 298 - Change of Boss
chapters.content:
Chapter 298: Change of Boss
Shao An was efficient. The villa was filled with a festive red color.
With the help of the medical staff and maid, they managed to put Qiu Tong in an upright position in bed. She was wearing a specially customized white wedding dress. Her fluffy skirt trailed to the ground, and the floral design made her look beautiful and lively.
The maid put on some light makeup on Qiu Tong, making her look demure with her closed eyes and slight smile on her lips.
Qiu Xingyuan, Qiu Xingqiao and Little Yu were all wearing formal attire. Under the gazes of the crowd, Jin Yang slowly walked to Qiu Tong and knelt on one knee. He took out the diamond ring that he had prepared and gently placed it on Qiu Tong’s ring finger. He then bent over and kissed the back of her hand.
Jin Yang looked up at Qiu Tong. He imagined that if she were awake, she would probably find the scene mushy and awkward.
Song Yan and Shao An applauded and cheered. The atmosphere instantly became lively as everyone cried in joy.
Jin Yang said slowly in a hoarse voice, “My life before I met you was all black and white. I worked hard on government affairs and immersed myself in my career. I had no goals and didn’t know joy.”
“Your appearance made me understand the beauty of life. It makes me look forward to every day from now on.”
“Qiu Tong, I’m very glad that you chose to be my wife.”
Accompanied by the music of the wedding march, the grand yet solemn atmosphere of the wedding ended. Jin Yang planted a light kiss on Qiu Tong’s forehead, his palm pressed against hers. It was exceptionally warm.
…
At the Liqing Corporation’s office building, the helicopter landed steadily on the helipad at the top floor.
A white-haired old man was escorted by many bodyguards to the General Manager’s office.
Yu Ge was about to greet him when he raised his hand and slapped Yu Ge’s left cheek. Yu Ge staggered, feeling dizzy. His eyes were filled with doubt as he said, “Dad?”
The old man was the founder of the Liqing Corporation. He rushed over when he heard the news of Bo Lang’s death.
Terrence narrated the situation to him from the side. The old man’s face darkened as he said in a loud voice, “The deployment of S City is centered on Bo Lang. He was leading hundreds of members, including many whom only he knows how to contact!”
“Because of your reckless and brainless plan, we lost hundreds of members for nothing.”
“The Vulture Organization’s communication network in S City has been severely damaged and everything is at a standstill. Do you know what you’ve done?”
Yu Ge tugged at his tie impatiently. Taking advantage of the fact that he was the old man’s biological son, he said arrogantly, “Only a few hundred people died. Send some more from outside the country, or recruit new men. What’s the big deal…”
Thump! The old man kicked Yu Ge hard in the stomach. But after seeing Yu Ge was kneeling on the ground, the old man’s eyes flashed with heartache.
Terrence watched everything from the sidelines. The old man waved at him and said, “Go out first. I have something to tell him alone.”
Yu Ge supported himself against the desk and stood up in pain. He was about to question the old man’s actions.
The old man beat him to it. He said in a helpless tone, “Do you think I own both the Liqing Corporation and the Vulture Organization?”
Yu Ge widened his eyes in confusion and asked, “What then?”
The old man chuckled. “I did build the Liqing Corporation myself, but five years ago, I nearly went bankrupt due to poor management. Fortunately, someone invested a huge sum of money in me so that I could make a comeback.”
“His only request is the Liqing Corporation to be the white glove of the Vulture Organization, to be their legitimate front.”
“At the end of the day, that man is the biggest boss of the Liqing Corporation and Vulture Organization, not me! Your actions have already angered him. Terrence is his trusted aide. I have to punish you in front of Terrence before he will let you off, understand?”
Yu Ge did not know how to react.
He recalled Terrence’s abnormal actions and couldn’t help feeling shocked.
Yu Ge looked at the commotion in the corridor outside and asked in a low voice, “Why did he allow me to attack Qiu Tong and not stop me?”
The old man frowned and said, “It might be because they want to use this opportunity to take control of the Liqing Corporation.”
“Your rashness caused the corporation to suffer losses of billions of dollars. This morning, the foreign board of directors decided to confiscate the portion of shares I left you. In other words, we no longer have any control and management rights over the Liqing Corporation in S City.”
Yu Ge was lost in thought for a long time. Terrence knocked on the glass door and walked in with a devilish smile on his face.
Terrence nudged his gold-framed glasses and nodded at the old man and Yu Ge. “Your hotel has been prepared. Please leave with the car. You are not needed here anymore…” Before Terrence could finish his sentence, Yu Ge rushed over and gripped his collar tightly.
Yu Ge gritted his teeth and questioned, “This is all part of your plan, right?”
Terrence pried his fingers away, his eyes flashing with disgust. “You’re the stupid one. You can’t blame anyone else.”
“I also want to thank you for helping me get rid of my long-standing opponent. I will find a way to repay you…”

chapters.title: Chapter 299 - Testing The Antidote
chapters.content:
Chapter 299: Testing The Antidote
In the laboratory on the top floor, the two different chemicals spun and collided crazily on the instrument panel, finally fusing into a dark purple liquid.
Qiu Xingyuan and Ye Luan did not blink as they stared at the entire concoction process. They could not help letting out low cries of joy.
They high-fived and hugged each other. The dark purple liquid meant that they had successfully tested an antidote that could stimulate the nervous system and neutralize the semi-finished modification drug!
The joy quickly faded. Qiu Xingyuan and Ye Luan reached out their hands at almost the same time, wanting to snatch the antidote.
Qiu Xingyuan grabbed the tube first. With his back facing Ye Luan, he pushed a syringe into the test tube.
Ye Luan stopped him with a solemn expression. “You’re Auntie Qiu’s son. Let me try…”
Qiu Xingyuan frowned and retorted, “I was the one who came up with the composition of this antidote. No one is more suitable than me. You are older than me. If anything happens, you have to take care of Xingqiao and Little Yu.”
“Especially Xingqiao. He may always make sarcastic remarks at you, but deep down inside, he admires you.”
The two children were very similar to Jin Yang and Qiu Tong. As they fought over the antidote, a pair of large hands descended from above and took away the test tube.
Qiu Xingyuan and Ye Luan lifted their heads in shock.
Jin Yang raised the syringe and tried to inject it into his body.
Ye Luan hurriedly jumped up and pressed down on his arm, shouting, “No! There’s a problem with this antidote!”
The argument in the laboratory woke everyone in the villa. Everyone gathered in the living room, all staring at the antidote.
Qiu Xingyuan clasped his hands and explained, “Although we specially made this antidote for the semi-finished modification drug, there are two components that Ye Luan and I are not sure about.”
“This version of the antidote might wake Mommy up or kill her.”
“But if this version doesn’t work, then the other one will definitely succeed.”
Everyone was silent. Qiu Xingyuan’s intention was undoubtedly to gamble with his life, betting on a 50% chance.
Qiu Xingyu asked with tears in her eyes, “Is that why Eldest Brother wants to test the antidote in place of Mommy?”
Qiu Xingyuan paused for a moment before nodding gently. An opportunity was right in front of him. Even if he had to use his life to try, he was willing!
Jin Yang held the test tube in his hand. He said without hesitation, “I should be the one testing it.”
Song Yan suddenly stood up, his eyes filled with confusion and anger. He asked, “There are so many death row inmates in the prison. Shao An can find any two and experiment on them! They are already destined for death, but what about you? What if something happens to you?”
“The capital will be paralyzed. What will the high-ranking officials of the various cities secretly do? Your beloved citizens might end up in a civil war!”
“You are usually so responsible and noble. Why are you so impulsive now? Put down the antidote!”
Shao An nodded in agreement and gestured to send someone to the prison to ask for subjects.
Jin Yang stopped them and said in a low voice, “It’s not safe in S City’s prison. Have you forgotten that the prison guards tried to kill Uncle Qiu? Can you guarantee that you can find a death row inmate and not a killer from the Vulture Organization?”
“The guards have suffered heavy losses. The entire villa is being guarded by less than 10 of them, as well as Ke Le and his men. We cannot withstand another attack, Song Yan, how can I risk everyone’s safety?”
Song Yan understood that his worries were reasonable, but he insisted and used the well-being of the citizens to pressure Jin Yang.
Jin Yang smirked, his eyes filled with trust as he said, “Haven’t you always wanted to be the president? Now, such a good opportunity is right in front of you. If something really happens to me, Shao An will obey you.”
“You are not like me. You will not be controlled by our father. Perhaps you can make a new world.”
With that, Jin Yang injected the antidote into his body.
The effects of the antidote spread throughout his body. Jin Yang lost his balance and fell to the ground. Qiu Xingyuan ran to his side and helped him lean against the back of the sofa, allowing him to breathe more comfortably.
Shao An wanted to bring him to the ward on the top floor, but Qiu Xingyuan stopped him with bloodshot eyes. “No!”
“Moving him will disrupt the antidote in his body. All we can do is wait…”
Over the past few days, the Qiu family had endured many desperate situations. Each of them had an expression of deep helplessness on their faces.
They thought that their hearts were already numb to death, but it still hurt.
Jin Yang’s face turned pale and ashen. He could feel the alternating heat and chill coming from his body.
Jin Yang’s body kept twitching and trembling until he lost consciousness.
Warm sunlight shone on his body. After an unknown period of time, Jin Yang slowly opened his eyes. He saw Qiu Xingyuan sleeping beside him and gently touched him. Qiu Xingyuan was instantly awakened and he immediately checked the monitor equipment.
“You’re awake. The antidote is successful!”
Qiu Xingyuan said excitedly. Jin Yang stroked his head and nodded.

chapters.title: Chapter 300 - A Storm Overseas
chapters.content:
Chapter 300: A Storm Overseas
Five days later, Qiu Tong opened her eyes.
She felt a dull pain in her bones as if they had been shattered and reformed.
Qiu Tong wanted to move her numb arms, but she ended up making contact with a tiny head.
Qiu Xingyu rubbed her eyes and opened them, yawning. When she saw Qiu Tong had awoken, she jumped up in excitement and bumped into Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao, who were lying beside her. The noise of the children woke Jin Yang and the others on the ground. They all stood up and surrounded the bed.
Qiu Tong did not expect the room to hold so many people!
Qiu Xingyu said in a choked voice, “Mommy, why are you only awake now? Eldest Brother said you should have woken up three days ago!”
Qiu Xingyuan and Ye Luan ran over to examine Qiu Tong’s body. They explained, “Perhaps the modification drug has been in Mommy’s body for too long, some components have merged with her blood and will take more time to be completely removed.”
“How are you feeling now?”
Qiu Xingqiao took the initiative to help her sit up. Such treatment surprised Qiu Tong.
Qiu Rong’s figure was hunched. He seemed to have aged five or six years over the past few days. He chased the children back to their rooms to have a good rest. Taking advantage of the quiet time, he told Qiu Tong about everything that had happened recently.
Qiu Tong looked down at the ring on her ring finger and grumbled with a smile, “What a cunning fellow.”
“You specially chose a time when I can’t reject you, right?”
Qiu Tong’s body was still weak. She would cough violently after saying a few words. Jin Yang sat beside her with a bowl of ginseng soup that he had personally brewed. He accepted all her complaints and thoughtfully scooped up a spoonful of soup. He blew at it until it was cooler before bringing it to Qiu Tong’s lips.
Jin Yang stared at her features, still feeling like he was in a dream.
Qiu Tong was touched by what Jin Yang had done for her. A wicked smile appeared on her face.
Jin Yang saw her red lips and understood her intentions. He smiled helplessly and kissed her.
Qiu Tong hooked her arms around his neck. Their intense movements accidentally tugged at her IV needle. She cried out softly, “It hurts!”
Jin Yang moved more gently and met her crafty eyes. He kissed her eyebrows.
Knock, knock, knock. Shao An, who had returned from outside, knocked on the door. By the time he saw the scene of Jin Yang and Qiu Tong kissing on the bed, it was already too late for him to back out. Shao An could only straighten his back and stare at the ceiling. His voice was filled with apology as he said, “Sir, I didn’t see anything!”
Qiu Tong pushed Jin Yang away with a chuckle, while Jin Yang said with dissatisfaction and anger, “You better have something important.”
Shao An straightened his back and respectfully handed over the documents in his hand. “Important information. Our team members outside the borders have sent back news that the Liqing Corporation’s headquarters has convened a board meeting to remove Yu Ge’s management rights in S City.”
“A few days ago, our men discovered that a helicopter landed on the roof of the Liqing Corporation branch office in S City. It’s suspected to be Yu Ge’s father.”
Jin Yang frowned as he flipped through the documents. Qiu Tong rested her chin on his shoulder and leaned over to look. Jin Yang noticed her actions and thoughtfully shifted the documents so that she could read better. He gestured for Shao An to continue.
Shao An shifted his gaze elsewhere. “We secretly followed Terrence and Yu Ge and discovered that Yu Ge and his father have not appeared for many days.”
“They must have been placed under house arrest at a hotel downtown. There are a few members of the Vulture Organization guarding the perimeter of the hotel.”
“All the armed forces in S City have been handed over to Terrence. Overseas news of the Liqing Corporation was cut off three days ago. It’s speculated that our men were discovered and their whereabouts are currently unknown. The Liqing Corporation has also publicly announced that they are reorganizing and are quickly amassing funds.”
The same thought appeared in Jin Yang and Qiu Tong’s minds. They had begun to take action…
Jin Yang gestured for Shao An to rest for the time being and wait for his orders. Qiu Tong held Jin Yang’s slender fingers as she fell into deep thought, playing with them subconsciously. “It looks like their focus is overseas. Yu Ge and his father are just pawns who were used. Yu Ge’s actions disrupted their plans, which is why they were placed under house arrest.”
The modification drug had been tested on her. From the remains of the communication device Shao An had found at the scene, it was very likely that Terrence had witnessed the entire process that day. They would definitely work hard to snatch Qiu Rong and the drug.
Instead of waiting for them to come knocking, why not…
Qiu Tong stared at Jin Yang sharply and suggested, “Let’s go find them overseas!”
“They definitely won’t expect us to dare to come to their territory. Only by doing so can we disrupt all our plans and have a chance of winning. The more we wait here passively, the more dangerous it will be.”
Jin Yang’s thoughts were the same as hers, but he was worried about Qiu Tong’s health.
Qiu Tong understood his concerns and cupped his handsome face in her hands. “Let Qiu Xingyuan do a full body examination on me. If he agrees I am well enough, we’ll leave, okay?”

chapters.title: Chapter 301 - Puppet Boss
chapters.content:
Chapter 301: Puppet Boss
Outside the borders, Qiu Tong and Jin Yang arrived at the airport in a helicopter. They quickly went to the secret base to rest.
Jin Yang ordered Shao An to instruct all their guards and spies hidden overseas to find clues about the Vulture Organization.
Late at night, Qiu Tong stood in front of the French windows of the villa in her pajamas. Her back profile looked a little lonely and worried.
Jin Yang came out of the study and hugged her soft waist from behind. He rested his chin on her shoulder and said in a low voice, “All the spies connected to the Liqing Corporation have been cut off. We can’t find out anything about the Vulture Organization.”
“Together with Shao An, I’ll go to the headquarters of the Liqing Corporation tomorrow as a potential collaborator and see if I can find any clues.”
Qiu Tong’s eyes were instantly filled with worry and anxiety. The enemy they were facing was hiding in the dark and they did not know anything about them.
“I’ll go with you.”
Jin Yang wanted to refuse at first, but he thought of Qiu Tong’s character. He finally nodded in agreement.
The next day at the Liqing Corporation headquarters, the CEO’s secretary stood at the door to welcome them with a smile and brought them into the guest room.
Qiu Tong examined the decor and layout of the corridor and vaguely felt that something was wrong.
In the guest room, a mixed-race man dressed in a suit was sitting on a leather sofa. When he saw Jin Yang, he smiled brightly and reached out to shake his hand. “I’ve long heard of your great name, Mr. Jin Yang. It’s the company’s honor that you came.”
“The Liqing Corporation’s branch in S City is very outstanding. I want to discuss the possibility of collaborating with you.”
As Jin Yang’s female companion, Qiu Tong sat quietly beside him, staring at the mixed-race man with a sharp glint in her eyes. Perhaps it was because her gaze was too purposeful, but it made the other party turn his head from time to time. Every now and then, he would pick up a glass cup from his desk and take a sip of tea.
Jin Yang tapped his finger on the glass panel on the table and asked with a smile, “Are you Liqing Corporation’s boss?”
“Why? Mr. Jin Yang doesn’t think I look like a boss?”
The mixed-race man was quick to reply. Jin Yang shook his head slightly, his attitude perfunctory.
The two of them only stayed at the Liqing Corporation headquarters for about half an hour before bidding farewell and leaving. They boarded the black vehicle parked in the underground parking lot. The moment the door closed, Shao An immediately gestured for the driver to drive away. He turned around and asked nervously, “Sir, how was it?”
“He’s definitely not the boss.”
Qiu Tong spoke firmly. Jin Yang had the same opinion.
“When he was talking to you, he tried his best to appear calm and collected, but his instinctive swallowing and evasive eyes betrayed the nervousness in his heart. He could answer all your questions about the Liqing Corporation within two seconds, as if he didn’t need to think at all.”
“A normal person would need time to think and respond when faced with questions, but he seems to have memorized the answers to the questions in advance.”
“It is as if he was a pre-programmed robot. There must be something wrong with him. He’s the scapegoat who is being offered to the altar.”
Qiu Tong frowned and stared at Jin Yang. It seemed like their hidden opponent was more cautious and cunning than they had imagined.
Shao An could tell the seriousness of the problem. He suddenly thought of a few suspicious points mentioned by a spy who had come to the villa to report. He said loudly, “Sir, before our spy lost contact with us, he sent us a topographic map. After investigating, we can confirm that it’s the topographic map of the Liqing Corporation’s headquarters. And the location of the red dot on the map is on the CEO level.”
“From the public information we have now, there’s no such space on the CEO level at that red dot.”
Jin Yang took the blueprint and rubbed the red dot with his slender index finger. He muttered softly, “Hidden room?”
Qiu Tong narrowed her eyes. “I’ll scout out the place tonight and see if I can open the secret room and find some clues. I’ve taken note of the security guards’ route and the exact location of the surveillance cameras. I can let Little Yu operate them remotely and help me temporarily shut off their system.”
“No, it’s dangerous.”
Jin Yang refused decisively, but Qiu Tong insisted, “We’re pressed for time. We have to take the risk and find their weak point.”
“You have a lot of men under your orders. You can’t go. I’m your wife, so I’ll take your place.”
Qiu Tong stared at Jin Yang’s determined and deep eyes. Jin Yang’s heart skipped a beat. He couldn’t control his emotions and raised his hand to grab the back of Qiu Tong’s head. He pulled her into his arms and leaned over to kiss her soft and delicate lips.
Shao An immediately averted his gaze and raised the partition.
Qiu Tong hooked her arms around Jin Yang’s neck and deepened the kiss. Their breaths mixed together, and Jin Yang seemed to want to melt the woman in his arms. It was only when the tip of his tongue felt a sweet taste that they parted reluctantly.
“Come back safely!”
Jin Yang stroked the top of Qiu Tong’s messy hair and said in a low voice.
Qiu Tong smiled and smoothed the crease between his brows with her fingers. All their emotions were communicated without need for words.

chapters.title: Chapter 302 - Realistic Nightmare
chapters.content:
Chapter 302: Realistic Nightmare
Late at night, thick clouds blocked out the moonlight.
Qiu Tong bent over and took out a dagger from her boot and held it in front of her. She looked at her surroundings warily and carefully circled around the security booth to the corner behind the Liqing Corporation. Qiu Tong picked up the curved hook she carried with her and flicked it twice.
The eight-clawed hook accurately hooked onto a drainage pipe. Qiu Tong pulled hard and nimbly climbed up.
Her figure was light and graceful, pressing against the wall like a lizard in the dark night.
Qiu Tong arrived at the air conditioner on the middle floor and took a breather.
She lowered her head and glanced at the ground, which was more than 10 meters high. There was no fear or nervousness in her eyes. Instead, there was a hint of disdain. A cold wind blew over and the rope swayed. It made one’s heart skip a beat.
Qiu Tong waited for the other security guards to leave before climbing to the top floor in two minutes.
She used a dagger to pry open a crack in the window. She took out two grains of sand from her bag and threw them to the ground. After confirming that there were no other anti-theft devices, she jumped down.
Qiu Tong patted the dust off her palm and looked around the CEO office of the Liqing Corporation for clues.
It was a little different from when she came earlier in the day. Qiu Tong noticed that the Picasso painting hanging on the wall had been changed to another one. The painting’s abstract eyes looked a little strange and terrifying under the moonlight.
She slowly approached as if she was subconsciously attracted to him. She raised her hand and searched the canvas.
Kacha! When Qiu Tong’s fingers touched the eyeball in the portrait, the sound of a mechanism being activated could be heard.
She turned around warily and watched as the walls opened to the sides, revealing an independent secret room.
“Looks like this should be the hidden space Shao An mentioned…”
Qiu Tong muttered to herself as she walked in to check. She realized that there were two blinking computers in the empty secret room. She would need a password to unlock them.
“Go and investigate Jin Yang’s whereabouts. It’s best if you can create trouble for them and chase them away.”
“I don’t want them to discover too many of the corporation’s secrets, understand?”
The mixed-race man’s voice came from the corridor.
Qiu Tong hid behind a curtain nervously. She could hear her heart beating as she maintained her stance, ready to attack at any moment. She swallowed silently, confirming the enemy’s location through the faint light from the curtain.
“I think I left something in the parking lot. Go get it for me.”
The mixed-race man stopped at the door and instructed his assistant.
Instead of entering the office, he went to the bathroom.
Qiu Tong took the opportunity to leave through the window. She used the zipline to descend to the bottom of the building and quickly disappeared into the darkness.
In the villa, Jin Yang heaved a sigh of relief when he saw that she had returned safely.
Qiu Tong told Jin Yang what she had found. “I think evidence of the Liqing Corporation’s misdeeds and the experimental drug they are developing are all in that secret room. They will be trying to chase us off soon. We need to act before they do anything.”
“I’ll lead a team to attack the Liqing Corporation tomorrow.”
Jin Yang made his decision. Qiu Tong nodded in agreement and requested to join the attack team.
At dawn, Qiu Tong had a very realistic nightmare in Jin Yang’s arms. She dreamed that she was standing at the edge of the cliff, with Jin Yang’s broad and straight back in front of her. The whistling wind brushed past her ears.
Qiu Tong vaguely saw a familiar figure standing in the light opposite her, but she could not hear the contents of his conversation with Jin Yang.
Bang… With a violent explosion, Qiu Tong felt a surge of warmth spread out before her eyes. Jin Yang’s figure slowly fell to the ground. She was in so much pain that she couldn’t breathe as she shouted loudly. It was only when Jin Yang shook her shoulder that she woke up from the nightmare.
“Did you have a nightmare?”
Jin Yang gently wiped the cold sweat off her forehead. “Don’t be afraid. It might be because of the change in the environment that made you so tense.”
Qiu Tong’s palms were covered in sweat. A voice in her mind kept reminding her that she seemed to have forgotten something.
This uneasy feeling made her desperate to absorb Jin Yang’s warmth. Qiu Tong pressed Jin Yang’s shoulders down and threw the thin silk blanket to the side. She lifted her silk sleeping robe and straddled Jin Yang’s waist, kissing him without a word.
Jin Yang sensed her desire and placed his palm on her slender waist, stroking upwards.
His fingertips gently traced Qiu Tong’s chest before he cupped her soft and plump breasts with his hands.
Qiu Tong’s body went limp as she laid on Jin Yang’s chest. His hot breath sprayed on her delicate neck, causing her body to tremble uncontrollably. When she closed her eyes, she would remember the scene in her dream. Her muscles tensed as she straightened her slender waist.
“Mmm…”
Jin Yang grunted. His eyes flickered with surprise when he saw Qiu Tong’s actions.
Qiu Tong slipped him inside her.
Jin Yang gritted his teeth and flipped over to press her down. The two of them hugged each other in the bedroom. The beautiful and ambiguous atmosphere lasted until the sun rose. The room was filled with the scent of love.

chapters.title: Chapter 303 - Deep Into The Secret Room
chapters.content:
Chapter 303: Deep Into The Secret Room
It was evening and two hours before the operation began.
Jin Yang assigned a mission to Shao An in the courtyard of the villa. Qiu Tong came out of the room rubbing her eyes. Through the misty glass, she saw that Shao An was a little agitated, as if he was objecting to Jin Yang’s orders. Jin Yang’s expression did not change. His cold profile was void of any emotion. His thin lips moved as he continued. Shao An’s eyes turned red, and he finally nodded heavily.
“…You have to ensure Qiu Tong’s safety and the children’s.”
Qiu Tong pushed the door open and vaguely heard these words. She looked at Jin Yang in confusion.
Jin Yang glared at Shao An. Shao An immediately turned around and wiped the tears from the corners of his eyes. He nodded at Qiu Tong and left.
Qiu Tong wanted to ask what they were talking about, but Jin Yang gently rubbed the top of her head. He asked her to turn around with a smile in his voice. As if performing a magic trick, he took out a velvet jewelry box and took out a sparkling necklace. He placed it around her neck.
“I’ve prepared this a long time ago and planned all sorts of occasions to present it to you. Since you were so enthusiastic about me last night, I might as well give it to you now.”
“I polished this necklace myself. The workmanship is not that great but it is full of meaning.”
Jin Yang rubbed Qiu Tong’s collarbone with his fingers, muttering longingly, “It looks good on you. Promise me you won’t remove it, okay?”
Qiu Tong felt that there was a hint of sadness in his words and felt increasingly uneasy.
Shao An broke the atmosphere when he appeared and said in a hoarse voice, “Sir, all the guards are ready. We can set off at any time.”
“Let’s set off now.”
Jin Yang restrained the emotion in his eyes and resumed his cold-blooded and stern expression. He held Qiu Tong’s hand and headed towards the Liqing Corporation.
The president’s guards were all well-trained. When the convoy arrived near the Liqing Corporation, it only took them half an hour to control the Vulture Organization’s men at the periphery.
Jin Yang and Qiu Tong easily entered the top floor. They pressed the button to open the secret room.
Shao An stood guard outside. Qiu Tong and Jin Yang rummaged through the bookcase in the secret room, wanting to find the Vulture Organization’s top-secret documents.
With a loud bang, a wall suddenly rose from the secret room, isolating the interior and exterior, trapping Jin Yang and Qiu Tong inside.
Jin Yang shielded Qiu Tong.
“Long time no see, Mr. Jin Yang. What are you looking for? Barging into my room like this?”
The electric-like voice echoed in the secret room in a strange manner. Qiu Tong immediately understood where the uncomfortable feeling in her heart came from. Everything had gone too smoothly! Ever since they met the mixed-race man, everything had been progressing to plan. It was as if an invisible hand was guiding them step by step into his trap.
Qiu Tong frowned and tried her best to calm down. She said sarcastically, “What’s the point of hiding in the dark?”
“Since we’re already trapped here by you, why don’t you come out and have a chat with us?”
The voice paused for a moment before asking in an amused tone, “What do you want to chat about?”
“Your evil behavior, your Vulture Organization has harmed many innocent people. You used your business as a cover to expand your territory, selling weapons and drugs, and researching the human modification drug…”
“You have to pay for what you did.”
Qiu Tong’s tone was firm. But the voice replied perfunctorily, “Miss Qiu, you’re too naive!”
“Your father developed the human modification drug. I just wanted to expand the production to benefit more people. What’s wrong with that? I sold weapons to those who needed to protect themselves so that they didn’t have to depend on others. They are all good deeds.”
“How many people has the Vulture Organization and Liqing Corporation helped over the years? I believe Jin Yang knows.”
Qiu Tong was speechless at the person’s shamelessness.
The person hiding in the dark thought of himself as a God who could save the world, but in reality, he was manipulating people. He was trying to become a God, looking down on everything, making the world spin according to his mood.
Such arrogance made Qiu Tong furious.
However, Jin Yang remained silent. He quietly stared at the display screens of the two computers and suddenly smiled.
“In that case, why did you want me to be the president? Wouldn’t it have been better for you to be the president from the start?”
His words stunned Qiu Tong. Her blood seemed to flow in reverse. Her limbs were cold and she trembled uncontrollably. Jin Yang’s eyes were filled with shattered calm as he questioned the voice. It was as if he had long guessed that this would happen today.
“What are you talking about? Jin Yang!”
Qiu Tong tugged at Jin Yang’s sleeve, wanting to reject her own conjecture, but the thoughts in her mind gradually became clearer.
All the scattered fragments pieced together to form a complete picture. The picture displayed was cold and terrifying.
Creak…
The secret doors on all sides opened and many masked men rushed out. They had guns and restrained Jin Yang and Qiu Tong.

chapters.title: Chapter 304 - It’s Actually Him
chapters.content:
Chapter 304: It’s Actually Him
The rumbling thunder tore through the silent night, as if tearing a rift in the sky.
The bookcase in the secret room opened from the middle. Terrence supported the man beside him respectfully.
Although he was wearing a silver mask and his face could not be seen clearly, Qiu Tong felt a strong sense of familiarity from him.
Jin Yang and Qiu Tong’s hands were tied up. The ropes were made of special materials and the more they struggled, the tighter it became.
After trying a few times, Qiu Tong panted heavily, her cells all highly vigilant as she searched for an opening.
The masked man sensed her hostility and chuckled nonchalantly. He said arrogantly, “Even if I let you go, you won’t be able to escape from the Liqing Corporation’s headquarters. There are countless traps and mechanisms hidden in this building…”
“Since we’re in your hands now, take off your mask.”
Jin Yang’s thin lips curled into a mocking smile as a self-deprecating glint flashed across his eyes. He forced out a word. “Dad.”
Qiu Tong’s throat felt like it was being strangled by an invisible hand. She couldn’t make a sound.
The masked man calmly took off the silver mask covering his face. A familiar face gradually appeared.
Jin Tao! It was him?!
The president’s father was actually the founder of this evil corporation?!
Qiu Tong’s heart suddenly constricted. Meanwhile, Jin Tao stared at Jin Yang with interest and asked, “When did you know?”
“When the Vulture Organization infiltrated the country, I felt that something was wrong.”
Jin Yang’s eyes turned bloodshot. Now that all his speculations were confirmed, he did not feel as relieved as he had imagined. Instead, his heart felt increasingly heavy and powerless. The enemy he had been pursuing for a long time was actually his family. This powerful realization made him smile bitterly.
“Ever since I took office, management of the underground black market has been extremely strict.”
“You once taught me that there will never be absolute black and white. Only by allowing the existence of gray areas can we maintain order better. I listened to your teachings and opened up the black market. I also tacitly allowed them to conduct small-scale arms trafficking and hire criminals… I also didn’t close off the Dark Web.”
“But everything that happened in these places is under my control. Many traffickers can only do business with my permission. Many years ago, the Vulture Organization marched into the underground black market in a domineering manner, bearing weapons that only the military has.”
As Jin Yang recalled the past, his deep voice did not waver even for a moment.
“At that time, I suspected that they had a high-ranking government official backing them, but I didn’t suspect you.”
“You’ve been living in the old residence the entire time. It seems like you’ve given me authority, but all the confidential documents are in your hands. I don’t even have the authority to transfer them. I noticed this when I was investigating the human modification drug, so I deliberately probed you…”
Jin Yang had secretly done many things, but Jin Tao was too conceited and did not care.
“I could almost confirm that you are the mastermind behind this, but before entering this secret room, I still had a ridiculous hope that I was wrong. The incense in this secret room is your favorite scent. It’s very difficult to obtain. Only the old residence still has a few boxes of it.”
“When Qiu Tong and I first came to this office, your mixed-race puppet revealed many flaws.”
“And I realized that the keyboard on the desk is slanted. The mouse, screen and keyboard are arranged in a certain subtle angle, as per your unique habit.”
“There’s a thin red string hanging from the leaf of the potted plant on the window sill. This is also your habit.”
Jin Yang’s gaze landed on Jin Tao. His familiarity with his father was his confirmation.
“Hahaha…”
Jin Tao laughed heartily. He couldn’t help clapping his hands and praising, “You’re indeed my son. You’re very outstanding.”
Qiu Tong narrowed her eyes. She saw Jin Yang’s fingers rubbing his palm and guessed that he had made arrangements in advance. She tacitly helped him stall for time and asked, “Why did you obtain the human modification drug? Why did you create a terrorist organization?”
“You’ve already obtained power and a life that ordinary people envy! What else are you not satisfied with?”
Jin Tao grinned when he heard her words. He raised his index finger and poked his chest, replying decisively, “I am greedy.”
“Everyone wants a greater authority. I can be the president in this country, but what about overseas? What about the world?”
“What I want is for everyone to submit to me and beg for my favor! I want to use the modification drug to create an army so powerful that no one can defeat it. This mutant army will fulfill my dream of ruling the world!”
“I was just one step away from success, but your father disrupted everything!”
Jin Tao’s eyes flickered with madness as he glared at Qiu Tong. “This so-called scientist tried to escape with his secret. How ridiculous!”

chapters.title: Chapter 305 - Counterattack
chapters.content:
Chapter 305: Counterattack
“Many years ago, I gathered Qiu Rong and the other scientists to develop a drug for me. The initial progress was very smooth.”
“Qiu Rong is a genius in the field of biochemistry. He can accurately adjust the ratio of the drug. In three months, I obtained the first experimental drug. The results of human experiments show that it can increase a portion of the body’s functions, but it will cause irreversible damage, leading to the death of the human subject.”
Fanaticism and ruthlessness flashed across Jin Tao’s eyes. He gritted his teeth and slammed his fist on the desk.
“I urged Qiu Rong to improve the ratio of the drug as soon as possible, but he argued with me.”
Qiu Rong believed that the drug cannot be tested on humans. It was too cruel and immoral.
In order to achieve his goal, Jin Tao rejected Qiu Rong’s opinion. He continued to choose soldiers from the army for the experiments. In just half a month, dozens of guards had died from the side effects of the drug.
Qiu Rong gradually realized that Jin Tao’s goal was not as benevolent as he claimed. He slowed down his research.
“Your father was as stupid as you. He tried to convince me…”
Jin Tao recalled what had happened that night. It was an electrifying exchange. Qiu Rong tugged at his collar and shouted angrily. “You have no right to harm anyone! Your actions are murder. You have to suffer the legal consequences!”
Qiu Tong frowned tightly, as if she could see what had happened back then. Her heart hung in suspense as Jin Tao narrated.
“I calmed Qiu Rong down and pretended to agree with his opinion to stop the experiments.”
“But he was smarter than I thought. He didn’t believe me. Instead, he took the opportunity to destroy all the relevant information in the laboratory and secretly helped one of the laboratory staff escape with the chip. By the time I discovered it, it was already too late!”
Jin Tao’s eyes were filled with hatred. If Qiu Rong had not meddled in this matter, he would have already ruled the world!
Qiu Tong and Jin Yang looked at each other and guessed that the researcher who fled with the chip was Ye Luan’s father…
Jin Tao took a deep breath to calm himself.
Terrence lit a cigar and handed it to him. He took a puff and blew out a thick cloud of smoke.
“Qiu Rong thinks he knows all the secrets of the modification drug so I can’t do anything to him.”
“That’s right. I can’t kill him. That’s why I sent people to detain him. I’ve planted many spies in the prison and used all sorts of methods to entice Qiu Rong to reveal his secret. But he’s like a mute. He hasn’t revealed any information to me all these years!”
“Until you showed up…”
Jin Tao raised his hand and pointed at Qiu Tong. Kinship was Qiu Rong’s weak spot and a lethal weapon which Jin Tao could use.
Qiu Tong suddenly understood everything that had happened. She frowned and asked, “You were the one who arranged the prison assassination!”
“Of course, I was the one who helped you to bail him out.”
Jin Tao nodded approvingly. “You all thought that you were safe and continued to develop the drug without worry. Little did you know that I have been secretly watching your every move, waiting for the day the drug would succeed! Bo Lang’s death was also deliberately planned by me. My goal was to see if the drug succeeded.”
The man in front of her could be described as terrifying.
Jin Tao’s every move was precisely calculated according to what he predicted they would do. Making use of Qiu Rong and Qiu Tong’s personalities, he designed countless traps for them to jump into. Qiu Tong recalled all sorts of things in the past and realized that many of her actions had been quietly guided along. A chill ran from the bottom of her heart and spread through her blood. This was the first time she felt afraid.
Jin Yang remained silent, as if waiting for someone.
Time ticked by. With a loud bang, the door to the secret room slammed open from the outside. Shao An stood outside with the president’s guards carrying rocket launchers. Jin Tao’s men did not dare to move.
“Sir! The people outside have been restrained. Two or three of them have escaped and we have sent men to chase after them.”
Shao An ran to Jin Yang’s side and quickly untied him.
Jin Yang rotated his wrists and untied Qiu Tong, pulling her to his side to protect her.
Jin Tao did not expect this to happen. “Did you get captured on purpose?”
“Father, you taught me a lot of things, including the way you think. After confirming that you’re the boss behind the Liqing Corporation, I knew very well that this building was a trap for me, so I pretended not to notice and let Shao An handle your minions outside.”
“You’re too arrogant. You won’t communicate with your men outside during the time I’m in your hands. You’re too confident that you will succeed in the end.”
Jin Yang stood tall and straight in front of Jin Tao. His eyes burned as he said in a low voice, “That became the key to breaking out of your trap!”
Qiu Tong heard her heart thumping. She took two submachine guns from Shao An’s hands and stared at Jin Tao warily. Her instinct told her that things were not that simple!
Jin Tao took out his gun and was about to pull the trigger when he realized that there were no bullets in the barrel!

chapters.title: Chapter 306 - Reversal
chapters.content:
Chapter 306: Reversal
“It’s you?!”
In an instant, Shao An led the guards to restrain Jin Tao and Terrence.
The butler in the corner slowly walked out of the shadows and came to Jin Yang’s side.
Jin Tao gritted his teeth and shouted angrily, his tone filled with reluctance. “Why did you betray me!”
“When did you start being under Jin Yang?”
A conflicted and guilty expression flashed across the butler’s weathered face. Jin Yang understood that it was not easy for him to admit to betrayal. The butler had been by Jin Tao’s side from the time when Jin Tao was just a youth. He had taken care of Jin Tao’s daily life over the years without making a single mistake.
It could be said that the person Jin Tao trusted the most was his butler.
Therefore, the butler’s betrayal infuriated Jin Tao.
Jin Yang sighed and explained, “I realized that something was wrong so I tried to persuade the butler to help me find clues and evidence. He firmly rejected my suggestion and didn’t even care what price I offered. The butler said that you were his boss and also his friend. He would never betray you or hurt you…”
“But half a year ago, his son was hospitalized due to a serious illness. He wanted to discuss with you about leaving the old residence to go back and take care of his son for a period of time.”
Jin Tao’s eyes were blank. A person who ruled the world would not care about the trivial family matters of others. It was just so trivial that he ignored it, but it ended up being the key to Jin Yang successfully bribing the butler!
“You will never understand how important kinship is to others. You rejected the butler. You were worried that he would leave with your secrets. I helped his son settle the hospitalization procedures and arranged for someone to take care of him. So he was willing to give up on you and choose me instead.”
Jin Tao licked the outline of his teeth with the tip of his tongue and shook his head in disdain.
The butler spoke in a hoarse voice, his tone slow but heavy. “Old Master, you are too ruthless.”
“When I first followed you, you had aspirations to be a leader. But slowly, your ambitions became too big and uncontrollably inflated. You wanted everyone to be obedient puppets, but people have feelings.”
“Madam was seriously ill and bedridden back then. She didn’t want you to continue sitting in the president’s seat and had an argument with you.”
“And what did you do? You locked her in her room and forbade anyone from hiring a doctor for her. She died of illness.”
When Jin Yang heard the butler recount the past, dusty and painful memories surfaced in his mind. His body swayed unsteadily. Qiu Tong hurriedly supported his arm and gently placed her slender fingers in his palm. The two of them interlocked their fingers, silently transmitting warmth and companionship.
The butler witnessed Jin Tao’s gradual changes and also understood that if he continued to let things go on, a major mistake would be made.
Therefore, when he learned of the trap today, he secretly communicated information about Jin Tao’s troop deployment to Jin Yang. He also removed the bullets from Jin Tao’s gun.
“Father, when will you understand that winning over the hearts of others is the only way to manage things?”
“Relying on tough methods and so-called mutant armies will never succeed!”
Jin Yang waved his hand, indicating for Shao An to leave with Jin Tao and Terrence.
In the next second, he saw a familiar but unexpected figure appear outside the secret room. Song Yan walked to them with Qiu Xingyuan, Qiu Xingqiao and Little Yu. He placed his finger on the trigger, forcing Shao An to stop.
Song Yan slowly came to Jin Tao’s side and handed him the gun. “Qiu Rong and Ye Luan are both outside.”
“Good, well done!”
Jin Tao patted Song Yan’s shoulder, his eyes filled with relief as he said, “I was right after all.”
“Are you crazy?”
Jin Yang asked with a trembling voice. He did not expect Song Yan to be involved in this. “What you’re doing now might ruin everyone! Qiu Xingyuan and Little Yu are your children. Can you really bear to make use of them?”
“You’re not fit to be a father!”
At this moment, Jin Yang could not be bothered with anything else. Pain flashed across Song Yan’s eyes, but he did not answer.
Jin Tao glanced at Qiu Tong and Jin Yang in surprise. “His children? You… don’t remember what happened in the past?”
These words were like a stone thrown into a calm lake, causing major ripples.
Jin Tao shook his head gently and said, “These children belong to you and Qiu Tong!”
Qiu Tong and Jin Yang stood rooted to the ground. They muttered softly. “What did you say?”
Jin Tao regained control of the situation and said kindly, “Didn’t you find that photo in the Qiu family’s old residence? That’s right, you were once Jin Yang’s lover, and these children are his. It’s just that I realized that you would affect my plan, so I made a preemptive move.”
“Your appearance changed Jin Yang. He started to ignore my orders. He even secretly tracked the Vulture Organization.”
“That’s why I asked the Vulture Organization to hunt you down…”
Jin Yang felt a sharp pain in his temples. Countless memories surged into his mind with Jin Tao’s words.

chapters.title: Chapter 307 - Hostage Situation
chapters.content:
Chapter 307: Hostage Situation
Many years ago, on a stormy night.
The Vulture Organization sent their top assassins to surround Jin Yang. In order to protect him, Qiu Tong attacked them to attract the enemy’s attention.
Jin Yang dragged his heavily injured body back to the vicinity of the villa, but he was stabbed during an ambush.
“You were severely injured and in a coma for many days. I got the butler to feed you some medicine that can cause you to lose your memories and completely erase Qiu Tong’s existence from your mind. I wanted to kill Qiu Tong and eliminate future troubles, but she managed to escape and survive.”
“Not long ago, I discovered that Qiu Tong had reappeared by your side. I wanted to kill her, but I discovered that she had also lost her memories of you. So I used her to influence you and make you follow my plan. Speaking of which, I have to thank her.”
Jin Tao lowered his head and touched the top of Qiu Xingyuan’s head. There was no affection in his eyes.
Qiu Xingyuan understood what Jin Tao had said. His eyes were cold as he jumped up and bit Jin Tao’s thumb.
Jin Tao shoved him away in pain. Looking at the bloody mark on his thumb, he raised his leg and kicked Qiu Xingyuan. “Wild dog!”
All that had happened had severely disrupted Jin Yang’s plans.
He frowned and asked Song Yan, “You knew from the start?”
Song Yan did not answer. He lowered his eyes and clenched his fists.
Qiu Tong’s eyes were filled with anger. She used all her strength to break free from the guards. The veins on her neck bulged as she growled, “Why? Qiu Xingyuan and the rest trusted you so much! Jin Yang and I also trusted you, that’s why we let you stay at home to protect them!”
“Why have you let us down? Why did you drag innocent children into our feud?”
Qiu Tong clenched her fists, her voice trembling from anxiety. “Just because you want to fight with Jin Yang for the position of president? I thought you understood that all those things in the past were just misunderstandings, and things would be different in the future. At the very least, you should remember the time we spent together. I didn’t expect you to have the same cold and ruthless blood flowing in your veins as Jin Tao. You will be left with nothing in the end. Even if you kill Jin Yang and me, no one will ever obey you!”
“Stop your nonsense!”
Qiu Tong’s words made Song Yan’s thin lips gradually lose color. Jin Tao noticed the fluctuations in his emotions and placed his palm on Song Yan’s shoulder. He said arrogantly, “Don’t listen to their nonsense. If you have power, you will naturally get everything you want!”
“Let’s go. Bring the scientist to the laboratory.”
Jin Tao came in front of the butler and kicked his chest.
The butler spat out two mouthfuls of blood and fell to the ground in pain.
Jin Tao took out a dagger and cut off two of his fingers.
Muffled wails echoed in the room. Jin Tao threw the bloodstained dagger to the ground and wiped the blood from his palm with a handkerchief before tossing it nonchalantly on the butler’s face.
Terrence pushed Qiu Rong to the laboratory. Before him were the most high-end instruments and top-grade chemicals.
This place had the highest level of security in the Liqing Corporation. Jin Tao pressed the muzzle of the pistol to Qiu Tong’s temple and lazily gestured for Qiu Rong to walk to the test bench. “Scientist, please make two bottles of the drug according to the correct ratio.”
“If you can concoct it, I will spare your daughter’s life.”
“Otherwise, she will die in front of you…”
Jin Tao sensed Jin Yang’s cold gaze and waved his hand with a frown. He said impatiently, “Of course, I won’t kill my own son.”
“I built this building for you guys. After tonight, your whole family will live here. Be it food or other aspects, there will be people taking special care of you. You might even live better than you do outside… just that you won’t have the freedom to leave.”
Jin Tao’s words made Qiu Tong scoff. She raised her stubborn eyebrows and shouted at Qiu Rong, “Dad! Don’t worry about me.”
Thump! Thump!
Two heavy punches landed on Qiu Tong’s abdomen. She bent over in pain and her legs went limp. Jin Tao tugged at her hair mercilessly and gave her two tight slaps. “If I were you, I definitely wouldn’t say anything now!”
Qiu Rong wanted to rush over, but there were too many guards surrounding him.
“I promise to do it, don’t hurt Tongtong!”
Qiu Rong instantly gave in. Ye Luan and Qiu Xingyuan also received permission to help.
Qiu Xingyu glared at Jin Tao with her black, round eyes. She said in a trembling voice, “Evil Grandpa, can I help too? I helped my brother and Grandpa Qiu create a data table for the formula. I still remember a little.”
“If I can produce it, can you stop hitting Mommy?”
Qiu Xingyu bit her delicate lips, looking like she was about to cry.
Jin Tao’s heart softened. He felt that the little girl would not be able to cause too much trouble. He gestured for Terrence to find her a computer to use.
When Qiu Tong heard Qiu Xingyu’s words, she felt that something was up. She looked up at Qiu Xingyuan and realized that Qiu Xingyuan’s index and middle fingers were crossed and slightly bent. This was their unique communication method. It meant that everything was going according to plan.

chapters.title: Chapter 308 - Strategy
chapters.content:
Chapter 308: Strategy
Qiu Tong’s pupils constricted violently as she tried her best to maintain her composure.
At the counter of the laboratory, Qiu Rong tested the ratio of the chemicals. He took two bottles of chemicals and handed them to Qiu Xingyuan. They exchanged glances and quickly poured the chemicals into the container with some powder. The mixture produced a violent reaction. Countless dense bubbles appeared on the surface of the liquid, and the color of the mixture gradually turned pink.
Qiu Tong frowned and tilted her head to look at Song Yan. He was sitting in front of Qiu Rong and could clearly see their secretive actions.
However, Song Yan did not tell Jin Tao. Instead, he moved to block the others’ view of Qiu Rong and Qiu Xingyuan.
Could it be…?
A white light flashed across Qiu Tong’s mind. She instantly understood and quickly exchanged information with Jin Yang.
Qiu Xingyuan swirled the powder while Qiu Xingyu typed on the computer keyboard. She used the same wireless network to attack the Liqing Corporation’s local network and retrieved the Vulture Organization’s terrorist activities in recent years. She also copied the information on the database to the public network and uploaded it to the National Intelligence Agency and other relevant departments.
The laboratory was so quiet that there was no sound. Everyone seemed to be busy with their own tasks.
Jin Tao’s gaze landed on Qiu Tong and suddenly felt that something was wrong.
Qiu Tong was very stubborn. She would not let Qiu Rong help them so easily. Her current attitude…
“Make them stop!”
Jin Tao immediately realized something was wrong and hurriedly shouted. Seeing this, Song Yan flew over to block Qiu Tong. The mercenaries hiding in the dark received the signal and rushed out, controlling the members of the terrorist organization and pressing Jin Tao to the ground.
Qiu Rong wiped the sweat off his forehead and panted heavily as if he had just undergone an intense exercise.
He took off his goggles and heaved a sigh of relief. “All the components of the drug have been destroyed.”
“All the chemicals in this laboratory have been turned into waste.”
Qiu Xingyu rubbed her sore shoulders and sweetly ran to Qiu Tong’s side to claim credit. “Mommy! Little Yu is very good too. All the information Uncle Song Yan asked me to destroy have been deleted. I’ve also destroyed their communication channels on the Dark Web!”
Qiu Tong squatted down in relief and hugged Qiu Xingyu tightly.
Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao ran over at the same time and huddled together with them. At this moment, the entire family was basking in the joy of reuniting.
Song Yan untied Jin Yang and shifted his gaze awkwardly to the floor in the corner.
Qiu Rong broke the silence and explained on behalf of Song Yan, “When Jin Tao contacted Song Yan, we heard it on the phone. Song Yan never thought of hiding it from us. I was the one who suggested that he pretend to agree and confuse Jin Tao so that he could help you complete the mission to destroy the Vulture Organization.”
“Song Yan was so worried that we will be accidentally hurt. He was very nervous on the way to the company.”
Qiu Rong looked pointedly at Qiu Tong. He gently tilted his head, indicating for her to apologize to Song Yan.
Qiu Tong licked her red lips and said softly with an apologetic expression, “I’m sorry, I misunderstood you. I didn’t mean to say those hurtful words back then. The situation at that time caused me to say those things. If you feel upset, you can punch me a couple of times?”
Song Yan finally smiled when he heard her sincere apology.
Jin Yang and Song Yan walked to Jin Tao. They looked at their once high and mighty father, who had now fallen to the ground. Their emotions were complicated.
“Father, you used all sorts of methods to make us fight against each other since we were young, in a vain attempt to separate us. You were able to control us then, but you probably didn’t expect that the truth cannot be forever hidden or altered…”
“When everything comes to light, it is inevitable to suffer a backlash.”
Jin Yang said in a low voice with pity in his eyes, “We will send you to the relevant legal courts for punishment.”
“B*stard! How dare you! I’m your father!”
Jin Tao finally shouted in panic. An evil smile appeared on Song Yan’s lips as he played with the loose hair on his forehead. He leaned over and stared at the face that was 70% similar to his. “Are you worthy?”
“When you tried to harm Jin Yang and used me to kill him, did you ever think that we were your sons?”
“Let’s not try to stir up such emotions between us. It’s dirtying my ears.”
Song Yan rubbed his ears and placed his hand on Jin Yang’s shoulder. The two brothers looked at each other and smiled.
Things seemed to have come to an end. Qiu Tong wanted to walk to their side to celebrate, but she saw Jin Tao’s hand touching his waist.
“Be careful!”
Qiu Tong shouted. She wanted to push Jin Yang away, but a bullet grazed her temple and pierced through two bottles of chemicals.
The pungent liquid splattered on the ground. Jin Tao was still kneeling on the ground. He stared at Qiu Tong with bloodthirsty eyes and pulled the trigger again.
“Die!”
A bullet, which seemed to contain all of Jin Tao’s anger, shot out of the barrel. Qiu Tong wanted to dodge, but it was too late. She closed her eyes gently and quietly waited for her fate.

chapters.title: Chapter 309 - Life Fading Away
chapters.content:
Chapter 309: Life Fading Away
A pair of hands pushed Qiu Tong away. She staggered to the ground. Jin Yang collapsed weakly into her arms.
Qiu Tong hugged Jin Yang tightly. Seeing the blood flowing out of his chest, she shook her head violently and muttered, “No!”
Jin Yang forced a smile on his lips, wanting to comfort Qiu Tong, but his actions made Qiu Tong’s tears flow even faster.
Qiu Tong pressed her palm against Jin Yang’s chest, trying to use her special ability to heal the wound. She ignored the countless pairs of eyes staring at her. There was only one thought in her mind. She had to save Jin Yang!
Countless memories surged into Qiu Tong’s mind. She remembered everything!
“Jin Yang, you promised me that we would grow old together. You can’t go back on your word…”
“You owe me a wedding. You can’t abandon me like this. Otherwise, I’ll hate you forever! I’ll never forgive you.”
Qiu Tong felt that her special ability was useless against Jin Yang’s injuries. She hugged him in a panic and muttered to herself.
Song Yan walked towards Jin Tao with a murderous glint in his eyes.
Jin Tao looked at Jin Yang, who was lying in a pool of blood. For some reason, he recalled the time when they were just children. Two identical boys would surround him with toy guns and toy planes, clamoring for his attention.
At that time, they were also very happy. When did things start to deteriorate irreversibly?
Jin Tao couldn’t remember. He picked up the gun on the ground as if he had lost his will to fight and slowly aimed it at his temple.
“Song Yan, you don’t have to do anything.”
At the end, Jin Tao chose to end his life, to end his own ambitions and greed.
He gave Song Yan the only mercy he could, to not let his son have to kill his own father.
Jin Tao knew that no matter how cold-blooded Song Yan was, he would not be able to bear the psychological trauma of killing his father.
Jin Tao slowly closed his eyes. He didn’t regret his actions, but he hated himself for failing in the end and losing to his two sons.
Meanwhile, Qiu Xingyuan, Qiu Xingqiao and Little Yu rushed to Jin Yang’s side.
Their eyes were filled with tears as they looked at Jin Yang. They called out in hoarse voices, “Daddy!” Their shouts made Jin Yang a little more alert. He sat up in Qiu Tong’s arms and raised his hand to touch Qiu Xingyuan’s face.
Two streaks of blood appeared on Qiu Xingyuan’s face. Jin Yang frowned and looked at him. “Don’t cry. A man shouldn’t cry.”
“I have no regrets now. I was able to hear you call me Daddy.”
Qiu Xingyu threw herself into Jin Yang’s arms, her tears blurring her vision. She tugged at Jin Yang’s sleeve and said, “It’ll be fine!”
“Elder Brother is very powerful. Grandpa, too. They can save you, right?”
Qiu Xingyu turned to look at Qiu Rong, but Qiu Rong lowered his head in silence. The bullet had pierced through his chest. From the amount of blood loss and his current condition, even if he were to undergo surgery on the spot, it would be hopeless. He could only let Jin Yang say his last words.
“Be good. Daddy knows that you’re all great. Without me by Mommy’s side in the future, you have to bear this responsibility for Daddy.”
“Don’t argue with Mommy in future, okay?”
Jin Yang coughed and spat out two mouthfuls of blood.
Qiu Tong’s eyes were empty and numb as she covered the wound on his chest. She couldn’t hear anything.
“Song Yan!”
Jin Yang’s gaze landed on Song Yan. Song Yan knelt beside Jin Yang and suppressed his emotions as he whispered, “Tell me!”
“I need you to be the president. I know you’re bold and more resourceful than me. You can definitely do better.”
“Shao An will assist you. Do well for me! Got it?”
Jin Yang held Song Yan’s hand tightly. The two brothers finally understood each other’s hearts now, but it was too late.
“I want to… talk to Qiu Tong alone.”
Jin Yang spoke slowly and with difficulty. Qiu Rong dragged Qiu Xingyuan, Qiu Xingqiao and Little Yu out of the laboratory. Only the two of them were left in the empty and quiet room. Qiu Tong stared at his face, as if she wanted to engrave his image in her mind.
She suddenly smiled and said self-deprecatingly, “You enjoy being a hero?”
“Who asked you to protect me? You want me to live on, beholden to you, so that I will never forget you.”
“Jin Yang, that’s impossible! If you dare to close your eyes, I will definitely leave with you…”
Qiu Tong said firmly. Her gaze landed on the dagger on the ground in the distance.
Jin Yang touched her lips with difficulty. He gave a gentle smile. “Tongtong, don’t be stubborn.”
“The children are still young and they need you to take care of them. Song Yan is rash and there are many things that you will need to keep an eye on…”
“I can see Song Yan’s feelings for you. After I leave, you might consider being with him… that’s a good choice.”
Jin Yang helped Qiu Tong arrange her future life. Qiu Tong shifted her gaze away and clenched her fists tightly. Her nails dug into her palms and blood dripped onto the ground, but it could not compare to the pain of her heartache.
“Smile and don’t let me see you cry, okay?”
Jin Yang said weakly. Qiu Tong could feel his life energy fading bit by bit. She smiled with tears falling.

chapters.title: Chapter 310 (END) - Finale
chapters.content:
Chapter 310: Finale
“To be honest, I was attracted to you the day we met again.”
“Even if I don’t remember my past with you, I still can’t help but care about you. Otherwise, as the president, how could I allow a complete stranger to get close to me? Shao An thought that there was something wrong with my mental state…”
Jin Yang struggled to say these words. After a short pause, he panted heavily. His lips turned ashen and his hands turned cold.
“No matter how many times I lose my memory, I will always be able to pick you out from the crowd again and fall in love with you.”
“Qiu Tong, live well and take good care of the children. If there’s a next life, we will meet again.”
A wind blew gently outside the window. Jin Yang closed his eyes in exhaustion and said slowly, “I won’t leave. I will always stay by your side and the children’s side. The sunshine, the wind, the rain, it will all be me. Don’t be sad. You have to smile!”
“I promise you.”
Qiu Tong nodded. Jin Yang smiled in relief, his expression and life frozen.
Jin Yang had lied. He had regrets.
He wanted to spend the rest of his life with Qiu Tong. He wanted to see Qiu Xingyuan and Qiu Xingqiao grow up and Little Yu fall in love. All their troubles had just ended and he could finally welcome a stable and blissful life.
However, Jin Yang had no choice. He couldn’t just watch as Qiu Tong encountered danger. If he had to choose, he would rather leave by himself.
Qiu Tong hugged Jin Yang’s body, which was gradually growing colder and stiffer by the minute. She kept silent, not moving at all.
Qiu Rong and Song Yan wanted to persuade her, but it was useless.
For the next 24 hours, Qiu Tong dealt with Jin Yang’s funeral affairs stoically.
She returned to the country with Jin Yang’s photo and locked herself in her room for a month. She refused to see anyone and refused to speak.
Who was more pitiful? The person who died or the person who was left behind?
No one had the answer. Qiu Tong sat by the bed with bloodshot eyes. She was holding Jin Yang’s pajamas in her arms. The room seemed to be filled with his scent. In her daze, Qiu Tong could almost see Jin Yang walking towards her with a smile. He smiled ambiguously and reached out his hand to her.
Qiu Tong raised her hand to the empty air, two drops of tears falling from the corners of her eyes.
Knock knock. Song Yan pushed the door open and entered. He smelled the alcohol in the air and turned on the lights in the room.
The glaring light made Qiu Tong instinctively wince. She frowned and said in a hoarse voice, “Get out.”
“Jin Yang won’t want to see you like this. The children are worried about you. They squat at the door of your room every day. Little Yu’s eyes are about to burst from crying. Qiu Rong is also refusing to eat and drink because of you. Can you bear to see them suffer for you?”
“There’s no way to change what happened. We have to move forward!”
Song Yan took out a foldable knife and threw it in front of Qiu Tong. “Otherwise, you can accompany Jin Yang! This way, there will at least be a deadline. Qiu Rong and the children will be able to walk out of their sadness after being sad for a period of time, and not continue to sink with you!”
“The current you is not like the Qiu Tong I know at all.”
“Jin Yang will never love such a cowardly woman.”
Song Yan turned around and left, slamming the door. Qiu Tong stared at the foldable knife in confusion. She wiped the sharp blade with her finger. The pain of her skin being cut woke her up a little.
A cool breeze blew in through the open window and a petal landed on Qiu Tong’s palm.
Warm sunlight shone on the side of her face, as if two invisible hands were stroking her hair. She suddenly smiled brightly.
Several years later, as the president, Song Yan eliminated the Dark Web and the terrorist organization. Qiu Rong and Qiu Xingyuan developed a drug that could improve the functions of the human body. However, this completed drug would not have any side effects on the body. Qiu Xingqiao was successfully accepted by the military special force. As the youngest officer, he protected everyone on this land.
As the top boss in the information technology field, Qiu Xingyu had created a VR experience game.
The game could read the user’s memories and construct virtual scenes based on real memories. Qiu Xingyu gave this game to Qiu Tong as a gift and named it “Tong”.
In the villa, Qiu Tong sat quietly by the window. Time had left its mark on her face.
She picked up the VR device and put it on. The virtual world and reality overlapped, making it impossible to tell what was real or fake.
Light footsteps suddenly came from behind. Qiu Tong turned around and saw Jin Yang’s familiar face. She couldn’t help covering her red lips as tears flowed down her cheeks.
Jin Yang reached out his hand and said in a clear voice, “Tongtong, long time no see.”
Qiu Tong slowly stood up and walked to the empty balcony. She stretched out her hand.
The old railing creaked in the wind and swayed gently, as if danger could happen at any moment.
“Jin Yang, long time no see!”
Smack… the fluttering white dress was dazzling and bright under the sunlight. The captivating redness encompassing Qiu Tong’s deep longing froze this moment. Forever.
